node.long_desc: Replaces Dee Zee Tool Box Paddle Handle Latch;Three Latching Styles to Choose From;Includes Set of Keys;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
At Dee Zee we construct rugged toolboxes that can stand up to years of use and abuse. That being said, we know things can wear out and break. Why replace the entire box, when you could simply replace the broken part?

Our Dee Zee Replacement Latch is a stainless steel, locking latch to be used as a replacement for Dee Zee tool boxes. Our Replacement Latches come in three latching styles for an exact replacement for your existing latch.

Comes with keys, a weather resistant gasket and rivets for installation. Latches can also be installed with bolts (not included) instead of rivets depending on your preference.

node.sales_desc: This 10 circuit Race only harness features a relay for each fused circuit. The wires are pneumatically terminated and pre-inserted into the fuse block and relay blocks. The fuse block is labeled for the circuits below but can be used to power any 12 volt electrical component. If you are also looking for a switch panel we offer Painless part numbers 50201 & 50202. These are designed to be plug and play with this harness. Each wire is oversized and custom printed with the circuit identification as well as using GM color codes for easy installation.

We offer two versions, one with a preterminated GM column mounted ignition switch connector and one without. Included with this harness are the following parts; a GM engineered fuse block & Painless mounting bracket; GM turn signal connectors; pre wired plugs for the headlights & dimmer switch; and each wire is printed with the circuit identification as well as using GM color codes for easy installation.

node.long_desc: This is our most popular performance distributor! The housing is machined from a billet of 6061-T6 aluminum on a state-of-the-art CNC machine producing exact tolerances. For high rpm stability, a .500 inch steel shaft is supported by a sealed ball bearing and a long sintered bushing. This shaft also receives a QPQ coating for friction reduction and resistance to corrosion. A precision machined reluctor is attached to the shaft which triggers the magnetic pick-up mounted in the housing. This high output magnetic pick-up is the most accurate way to trigger your ignition. Plus, with no moving parts to wear or adjust, the pick-up is maintenancefree! Just above the pick-up is MSD?s adjustable mechanical advance assembly. Different springs and stop bushings are supplied so you can tune an advance curve to match your application.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: Manufactured from highly resilient, black powder-finished aluminum panels, the Pace Edwards Switchblade Metal Retractable Tonneau Cover is ideal for those who often find themselves requiring at-a-moment's-notice payload access. As sharp-looking as the illegal blade for which it was named, this top-of-the-line tonneau allows full rear visibility and installs in no time at all. Equipped with innovative Continuous Tension Spring technology, this cover requires only that you activate the pinch grips underneath and the cover retracts with butter-smooth efficiency. To close, just tug on the convenient pull-strap. Meant for crew-cab, extra-short-bed trucks, it also comes with a removable canister and rails for total, tail-to-cab access.""

node.display_name: Pace Edwards Ultragroove Metal Tonneau Cover
node.long_desc: Pace Edwards Ultragroove Metal Tonneau Cover;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: When it comes to hauling a load from one work site to the other, from home to the campground or just from your buddy's old place to the new, your truck can handle it. But when intemperate weather and hazardous roads threaten whatever you've got back there, the Pace Edwards UltraGroove Metal Tonneau Cover is what you need to keep the storms of life at bay. Boasting an aerodynamic, metallic design that's double-tough thank the matte-black, heavy-gauge aluminum construction for that this retractable replacement tonneau is as functional as they come. Withdrawing easily into the canister head at the front of your truck bed at the simple turn of a lock knob, the Pace Edwards UltraGroove Metal Truck Bed Cover secures every foot along the rail for as much accessibility as you need. To close, just give a tug on the integrated pull strap. This bad boy's been outfitted with drain tubes at the front and rear of the rail to facilitate water runoff on monsoon-y days and nights. Your Pace Edwards Ultra Groove Metal Bed Cover installs relatively easily with clamps absolutely no drilling necessary and is backed by a 3-year limited warranty.

node.display_name: Pace Edwards Ultragroove Electric Tonneau Cover

node.sales_desc: Pace Edwards UltraGroove Electric Tonneau Cover provides added protection with an electric motor that wires directly into your truck battery, this Pace Edwards cover provides the convenient hands-free, remote operation you've been looking for. Along with an electro-magnetic brake that allows you to lock the cover in any position, you can count on this cover for some much-needed peace of mind. Sporting T-slot and rear end caps that make for easy access to the installation hardware, racks and style bars, these top-of-the-line truck bed covers also utilize drain tubes at the front and rear of the rails for improved water management to ensure all your gear is protected. With the added bonus of a drive system release lever, you can depend on this cover even if you lose power. Adding to the convenience is the clamp-in design. Your Pace Edwards UltraGroove Electric Truck Bed Cover displays rigid aluminum panels with a durable matte-black powder-coat finish and is covered by a 3-year limited warranty.

node.long_desc: Motactor (motor + digital contactor) dramatically simplifies winch installation reducing install time by up to 50%;Advanced digital controls allow for monitoring of speed, load, and motor temperature;Built-in load limiter prevents damage from overloading winch;All-metal, waterproof construction is exceptionally durable and keeps the elements out;All-new modular controls allow for expandability;Robust new clutch design based on legendary WARN 4WD hub lock know-how;Limited lifetime warranty (mechanical), 3 year warranty (electrical);California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: With the all-new AXON lineup, WARN has taken winching to the next level by combining a powerful motor and first-of-its-kind digital contactor into one unit called a Motactor. The WARN Motactor increases performance, drops installation time, and provides never-before-seen levels of performance and feedback to the user. Tech is nothing without durability, so we made AXON the most durable powersports winch ever. All-metal construction, waterproof sealing, and increased structural rigidity are made for extreme environments. It's smart, tough, and perfect for a wide range of powersports vehciles. Available in 3,500, 4,500, and 5,500 pulling capacities, with a choice of steel or Spydura synthetic rope. Rocky terrain, unpredictable conditions, and unexpected challenges can make anyone feel the heat. That's why WARN's new AXON winches take an already legendary reputation for proven performance to a whole new level. Re-engineered from the ground up, AXON winches completely protect critical components from water and mud with critical electronics sealed inside the metal housing.And with revolutionary new technology, AXON is the most advanced powersports winch ever.

node.long_desc: Extreme IP68-rated waterproof sealing keeps the elements out;Durable all-metal construction;Robust new clutch design based on 70+ years of WARN 4WD hub lock know-how;Black powder-coated finish for corrosion resistance;Load-holding brake for great control;Smooth and reliable all-metal th)ree-stage planetary gear train;Limited lifetime warranty (mechanical), 3 year warranty (electrical);California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Whether you're on the job or on the trail, WARN VRX winches work as hard as you do thanks to all-metal construction, a new clutch based on the legendary WARN 4WD hublock design, an ultra-durable all-metal gear train, and full waterproof sealing to take on the elements. VRX is available in 2,500, 3,500, and 4,500 lb. capacities and is perfect for a variety of vehicles and any jobbig or small. Whether your day involves tracking down a buck or working the cattle ranch, more durability is never a bad thing. And the new WARN VRX winches are the very definition of durability. Not only is the all new VRX completely waterproof, it also features a sturdy all-metal drivetrain and end housing, improved clutch design, increased capacity and class leading motor technology. The new best-in-class VRX elevates every feature of our standard duty winch except the price. The result: a whole lot of get-the-job-done-ability.

node.sales_desc: The Warrior Products Universal Brush Guard is designed to attach to any flat surface front bumper with a wide enough top surface. Manufactured using high quality steel, this one-piece welded guard is formed from 1 round steel tubing, and provides protection when off-roading from shrubbery to the front grill and headlights. The guard accommodates an optional light tab accessory (#59003). These guards are available in several configurations including 3 main styles; classic, pre-runner and stinger style.Pre-Runner and Stinger Brushguards are built with an aggressive angled look and have optional side support struts for added styling and strength. Applications available to fit JK Stubby Bumper and shallow mount to fit most rock crawler style bumpers. Center hoop only applications available as well; these versions have no side struts.Stinger & Grille Hoop Winch Mounts offer a combination of a stinger style brushguard with a protective grill hoop and is combined with an integrated winch mounting plate. While this mount is specific to certain vehicles, it should be compatible with nearly all bumpers that are flat at the top edge of the vehicles frame."

node.long_desc: Made from tough Dura-Flex 2000 TPO material, Bushwacker Trail Armor Corner Guards offer custom style that stands up to tough use;100% UV protected to prevent chalking or fading year after year;Installs without drilling using automotive-grade 3M adhesive;Made in the USA and backed by Bushwacker's Limited Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Your Jeep is made for getting off the beaten path. So make it stand out from the crowd, with custom-built Trail Armor from Bushwacker. Trail Armor combines trail-proven toughness with state-of-the-art Dura-Flex 2000 TPO material for a look all its own. Dura-Flex 2000 TPO is our proprietary automotive protective material, ruggedized for extra durability and flexibility. Unlike steel, it can't rust. And, unlike lesser products, it's 100% UV protected to prevent chalking.

We make everything right here in the USA, designing to the tightest tolerances for a factory-like fit. Yet, you install Trail Armor in minutes with automotive-grade 3M adhesive, no drilling needed. Like all Bushwacker products, Trail Armor is backed by our Limited Lifetime Warranty. Your Trail Armor starts out looking tough, and lives up to its looks year after year.

node.long_desc: OE matte black finish matches factory trim;Protects cowl vent from debris;Unique design adds style while increasing airflow through vents;Guaranteed not to chalk or fade;Lifetime Bushwacker warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Your Jeep Wrangler is made for getting off the beaten path. So make it stand out from the crowd, with custom-built Trail Armor(R) from Bushwacker. Trail Armor(R) combines trail-proven toughness with state-of-the-art Dura-Flex(R) 2000 TPO material for a look all its own. Dura-Flex(R) 2000 TPO is our proprietary automotive protective material, ruggedized for extra durability and flexibility. Unlike steel, it cant rust. And, unlike lesser products, its 100% UV protected to prevent chalking. We make everything right here in the USA, designing to the tightest tolerances for a factory-like fit. Yet, you install Trail Armor(R) in minutes with automotive-grade 3M (TM) adhesive, no drilling needed. Like all Bushwacker products, Trail Armor(R) is backed by our Limited Lifetime Warranty. Your Trail Armor(R) starts out looking tough, and lives up to its looks year after year.

node.long_desc: Street Flares are custom designed for each individual vehicle, so you get a factory-like fit and finish;Made from Dura-Flex 2000 and are guaranteed not to warp or crack;100% UV protected to prevent chalking and fading;Matte black finish for a sleek and stylish accent or paint them for a custom look;Installs easily with no drilling and custom mounting hardware;Proudly made in the USA with a Limited Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Give your Truck or SUV a sportier stance, with Bushwacker Street Flares. They're exactly the right fender trim to complement stock or low-profile wheels and tires, and look great with lowered suspensions. We design Street Flares for each individual vehicle, so you get a factory-like fit and finish. And you get that sleek, streamlined look in minutes, thanks to our no-drill installation process and custom mounting hardware made especially for your vehicle.

Street Flares are designed and made in the USA from Dura-Flex 2000. Dura-Flex 2000 is our exclusive material, specially designed for extra durability and flexibility. It won't chalk or warp the way inferior materials will, because it's 100% UV protected and built thick and strong. Street Flares have a matte black finish that looks great right out of the box - or paint them to create a factory-matched, accented, or one-of-a-kind look. With Street Flares you get customized protection with an urban edge.

node.long_desc: The ultimate defense against on and and off road debris;Custom designed for your Jeep, Truck or SUV;Made from Dura-Flex 2000 textured material and are crack,warp and UV resistant;Guaranteed to be durable and flexible on and off the trail;UV protected so they won't chalk or fade;Sleek OE matte black finish but can be painted for a custom look;Bolt on installation with heavy duty hardware with no drilling or cutting;Proudly made in the USA with a Limited Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
With their recessed stainless steel bolts and massive presence, Pocket Style Fender Flares are a Bushwacker original and an off-road icon. They're custom-designed for your Jeep Wrangler to complement a wide range of wheels and tires with, or without a lift kit. You can mount them right out of the box, with their tough, OEM-style matte black finish - they're UV protected so they won't chalk. Or, paint them to match or accent the body color, for a factory-custom look.

Pocket Style Fender Flares are made in the USA with our strong, proprietary Dura-Flex 2000 textured material. Its the thickest, most flexible material available, tailor-made for added durability and flexibility on the trail. Despite their hard-core bolt-on styling, no sheet metal drilling or cutting is required.

For extreme performance with style to match, its in the pocket.

node.sales_desc: Each 2.5-gallon Patent Pending Cam Can unit comes complete with one mount and three cams to safely attach to any Jeep Wrangler or Toyota rear mounted spare tire. Purchase additional mounts and cams to store your Cam Can in the garage or on your trailer. The compact size allows the Cam Can to fit easily within the diameter of a 15-inch wheel, and it can be removed in seconds using built-in handles. The center lockable shaft is available in two lengths to accommodate up to two Cam Cans, using the lock of your choice. Rotational Molded Paxton 7000 Series Polyurethane Resin is used to manufacture each Cam Can, providing protection from harmful UV rays and drops that can cause leaks. Available colors/options include: Red CARB Approved with spout for gasoline, Green for any non-fuel liquid or Gray/Blue for potable water. Daystar also offers an L-bracket specifically designed for UTVs.

node.sales_desc: Many movable parts of your vehicles undercarriage are serviceable, including ball joints, steering components, driveshafts, etc. Why wouldnt you want your vehicles suspension points to be serviceable as well? Daystars Greasable Bolt & Bushing Kits allow you to do just that. Available in both application-specific kits as well as universal kits perfect for the fabricator, these kits contain bushings with flutes that allow grease to flow across the entire bushing surface, eliminating squeaks and wear. This grease is delivered via rifle-drilled bolts with an easy-to-access grease zerk on the end and a sleeve with a grease hole in the center. These kits include the specified bushings, bolts, and sleeves in one convenient package. Combine our Greasable Bolt & Bushing Kits with our Lubrathane, a unique blend of grease that resists contamination and will not degrade Polyurethane bushings.

node.sales_desc: Turn your ordinary main eye bushings into greasable super bushings. node.long_desc: Hedman Hedders was the first manufacturer to introduce advanced aerospace technology to the hedder industry. The alloy of ceramic-metallic composition used by Hedman, now known as HTC (Hi-Tech Coating), was and still is considered the very best thermal coating available for your hedders. HTC is bonded to your hedders with a strength factor exceeding 10,000 PSI. This durability makes the finish resistant to abrasion and chipping. Oil and grease stains can be removed with polish or fine steel wool. HEDMAN'S HTC COATING IS GUARANTEED against external rust-through for a FULL 5 YEARS. Together with Hedman's Lifetime guarantee against defects in workmanship, you will have years of worry-free hedder ownership.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: Dynamometer tests prove that a strategically positioned change in the primary tube broadens your engine's overall torque curve. After installing Hedders, a Small Block Chevy engine of 5.7L piston displacement will experience a Torque Boost in the 2800 to 3200 and 3600 to 4000 RPM ranges. The result is a solid increase in low RPM towing and pulling power, increased RPM recovery rates upon gear shifts, and more power during downshifts for passing. All these gains with no loss of torque during the mid-RPM range. These hedders work equally well on street-strip applications and trucks!;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: The RIGID Reflect is the first LED light that not only illuminates the road ahead, but also allows you to see what's behind. The RIGID Reflect is an advanced LED lighting solution with a fully adjustable side mirror all in one. Though originally developed for UTV and Powersports applications, the Reflect is a great solution for just about any off-road application. The Reflect uses RIGID's patented LED technology and new side-shooter optics to provide a wide beam of light for cornering and drifting. For even more versatility, there are also built-in amber LEDs on the outside edge of the fixture that can be used as turn signals, flashers, or even auxiliary running lights. Roll-cage mounting clamps make installation easy, while aiming of both the light and the mirror can be adjusted independently. The RIGID Reflect is one more compact, versatile lighting solution that enables off-road enthusiasts to Own the Night.

node.display_name: Goodyear Wrangler MT/R with Kevlar Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 30 to 40 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 20 inch diameter;Black and Outlined White Letter Sidewall;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Goodyear Wrangler MTR With Kevlar tire has an asymmetrical tread design and the DuPont Kevlar reinforced sidewalls promises to be a contender in the hot MT tire market. Goodyear says using Kevlar increases sidewall toughness and puncture resistance by 35 percent. It also helps reinforce the sidewall for on-pavement driving. The asymmetrical tread design looks directional, but Goodyear says the tires are NOT directional, can run either way and have been tested that way. For those who don't like white lettering, the new MTR with Kevlar might disappoint, as many sizes will have white outline lettering. That means white outline letters out, ready to be scraped into white sidewalls by rocks. The larger sizes up to 42 inches, will have black lettering, so that will be fine.The silica tread compound enhances wet traction and the durometer seems to be between the old MTR and the sticky comp tires Goodyear has built. The rubber feels soft and supple when doing the old twist and fingernail tread test (scientific test procedure). The Goodyear MTR with Kevlar is a very competent tire and worthy descendent of the Wrangler MT and MTR.

node.display_name: Rock Hard 4x4 Freedom Series Tire Carriers
node.long_desc: Supports up to 37 spare tire;100% bolt on install;Tank mount plus cargo basket options;Hi-Lift Jack mount included;CB antenna mount included;1/2" diameter bronze oil lite bushings;Black powder coat finish;100% Made in USA;Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The perfect solution if you're looking to run larger than factory tires but don't want to have to install a bumper mounted tire carrier! Our Freedom Series Body Mount Tire Carrier replaces the limited hinges on your tailgate with our extreme duty complete tire carrier replacement. Easy to install with zero cutting, drilling, or welding required. The tailgate operates just like factory using the factory handle to open and shut the tire carrier. Heavy duty bronze oil lite bushings and massive 1/2 bolts firmly secure the tire carrier to our 1/4" thick steel hinge side mounting brackets. Works with virtually all aftermarket rear bumpers including factory."

node.long_desc: 16 gauge steel construction;Durable powder coat finish;Flips up to provide access to winch without removing license plate;Includes license plate mounting hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If you have a winch on your vehicle and your state requires a front license plate, here's the solution! Tuffy's Flip-up License Plate Holder allows your front license plate to attach firmly to your winch fairleads and flips out of the way when you need to use your winch. It's made of durable 16 gauge steel instead of plastic like others on the market and includes hardware for attaching the license plate.

node.long_desc: Prevents dust and debris from entering the bearing protector;Bearing protector maintains pressure and keeps bearing greased;Sold as a pair;With CURT wheel bearing protectors, you can ensure that your wheels keep turning, quiet as a mouse;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: Misalignment spacers provide room between the heim joint and mounting surface to allow the heim its full range of travel. Required in most heim joint applications, misalignment spacers prevent heim joint from binding against mount surfaces and damaging the components. Misalignment spacers can also be used to adjust the clearance between the link and other surfaces. Sold individually.

node.sales_desc: The Yeti Rambler 14 oz. Mug is the toughest, most over-engineered camp mug out there. Unlike traditional camp mugs, this double-wall vacuum-insulated body protects hands from hot or cold contents while keeping coffee, chili, oatmeal you name it well-insulated. The mug's wide opening means contents are easily accessible, but will cool quicker. That's why the mug comes with the standard Rambler 30 oz. Lid (also compatible with the Rambler 30 oz. MagSlider Lid) so you can cap it and keep it hot until you're good and ready.

Whether you're at the ranch, on the boat or in the garage, this 5-gallon bucket is nearly indestructible and ready to work. But don't depend on it for keeping ice cold, it has other jobs to do.

node.sales_desc: With the Yeti Panga Duffel, you're prepared. This fully-submersible duffel offers zero access points for rogue wetness into your gear. Panga's ultra-durable design withstands getting dunked and dragged while remaining 100% dry on the inside.

node.long_desc: Specialty Flags;Double sided flag zips onto any size sleeve;Interchangeable flag system;Sleeve and flags sold separately;Fits Roll Bars, CB Antennas and More;Sewn with UV protected outdoor thread;Zippers are heavy-duty marine grade;Flags measure 12x18 inch unless specified;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Forever Wave flags zip onto any size sleeve. They are the only interchangeable flag system for Roll Bars, CB Antennas, ATV's Golf Carts, Boats, and More! Their system consists of two parts: the sleeve and the interchangeable flags that attach to it. The sleeve attaches to a bar or post and the flags zip on/off the sleeve. Each flag has a zipper attached that matches up with the zipper on the sleeve. This allows you to swap out different flags as often as you like. The flag sleeve is made of marine grade outdoor mesh, sewn with UV protected outdoor thread. The flags are mostly outdoor nylon. The zippers are heavy-duty marine grade. This product is built to last and can withstand wind and outdoor elements. Most of the flags measure 12x18 inch unless specified. Made in the USA.

node.long_desc: Includes Evolution CTS2 programmer and Jammer Cold-Air Intake
node.sales_desc: Performance has never been easier. Edge Products is pleased to offer you two standout products in one kit to optimize your gas trucks power, fuel efficiency, and overall driving experience. The new Stage 2 Kits from Edge include a best-in-class Evolution CTS2 programmer and Jammer Cold-Air Intake. We've bundled superior performance with tremendous value and savings. Be sure to see just how much money you can save by purchasing a Stage 1 kit as opposed to buying these products individually. Power, savings, and reliability are available now for your driving pleasure.

node.display_name: KC HiLites A-Pillar Light Mounting Brackets

node.long_desc: Recommended for conventional manual transmissions, differentials, final drives and other gear applications;Meets the requirements of most differential and manual transmissions;Low odor formula:Always consult your engine builder or owner's manual for the correct service category and/or viscosity grade
node.sales_desc: VP Hi-Performance Gear Oil is a high performance extreme gear oil providing excellent protection against high-speed scoring, low speed/high torque wear and heavy shock loading conditions. Also, the oil provides outstanding shear stability, low-temperature fluidity, low frictional drag and resistance to foaming.

node.display_name: KC HiLites Hood Light Mount Brackets

node.long_desc: Includes two 6 light bars and adjustable steps; Sleek design follows truck body and matches M1A2 front bumper; Integrated D-ring mounts for added strength; Removable mesh panels for customization; Mounting points provided for OE license plate lighting and trailer plug; Fully compatible with OE sensor packages; Radius to match OE styling;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The all new M1A2 Heavy Duty Modular Truck Bumper gives you full control to transform your truck - depending whether you want to conquer the toughest trails or simply make heads turn. The powerful, 1/8 steel bumper is smart-engineered for both strength and weight savings and the lower panels can be removed for better approach angles and tire clearance. The blazing 21" LED center light bar can be installed above your bumper to light up the darkest roads. Once off the trails, the modular design allows you to take out the winch and plate (without removal of the bumper) and install the main light bar inside the winch cavity, giving it a sleek, stylish display that will be the envy of any urbanite."

node.long_desc: Method 312 Method Bronze/Black Wheels;Wheel Size: 17 and 18 inch Diameter;Bolt pattern: 5, 6 and 8 Lug Design;Finish: Method Bronze/Black;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Method MR312 is a new street wheel for 2018. Modeled after the 106 Beadlock, the MR312 brings innovative styling and rock solid reliability to your daily driver or weekend rig. The first thing you'll notice is the all-new v.3 Stree-Loc ring. Removable stainless steel bolts around the lip are protected against shearing. A concave split-six spoke design keeps things clean and simple with a subtle Method' debossed at the end of one spoke. The 312 includes a bolt-on center cap with hardware. Sizes offered are 17 and 18" with applications for most trucks, Jeeps, and SUVs."

node.long_desc: Method 312 Matte Black Wheels;Wheel Size: 17 and 18 inch Diameter;Bolt pattern: 5, 6 and 8 Lug Design;Finish: Matte Black;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Method MR312 is a new street wheel for 2018. Modeled after the 106 Beadlock, the MR312 brings innovative styling and rock solid reliability to your daily driver or weekend rig. The first thing you'll notice is the all-new v.3 Stree-Loc ring. Removable stainless steel bolts around the lip are protected against shearing. A concave split-six spoke design keeps things clean and simple with a subtle Method' debossed at the end of one spoke. The 312 includes a bolt-on center cap with hardware. Sizes offered are 17 and 18" with applications for most trucks, Jeeps, and SUVs."

node.display_name: Bushwacker Max Coverage Pocket Style Fender Flares
node.long_desc: Bushwacker Max Coverage Pocket Style Fender Flares feature more tire coverage then their standard Pocket Style Fender Flares;The Max Coverage Pocket Style Fender Flares are perfect for trucks and SUVs that have bigger tires and wider wheels;These flares offer an aggressive off-road style and bolt-on look;You can mount the Bushwacker Max Coverage Fender Flares right out of the box, and with their UV-protected OEM-style matte black finish, they won't fade or chalk.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
If you've wished that we make a wider Pocket Style Fender Flare, something with more tire coverage for rigs with really big tires, really wide wheels, and big liftsyour product is here. Introducing Bushwacker Max Coverage Pocket Style Fender Flares. These flares will give you maximum coverage without having to cut the sheet metal.

All Max Coverage Pocket Style Fender Flares are made from strong Dura-Flex 2000 material that is 100% UV-protected and won't chalk or fade. Of course, they are easily painted for a factory-custom look, but also look great in their OE matte black finish. They install easily without cutting and there's minimal drilling, if any (it depends on the application), plus they add a rugged off-road look without removing any sheet metal. And like all Bushwacker products, they're made in the USA and carry a limited lifetime warranty.

So if you're looking for more tire coverage, more paint protection from dirt and mud, and an easy installation, we've got you covered with the Max Coverage Pocket Style Fender Flares.

node.long_desc: Provides up to 1.75 inches of tire coverage from debris;Installs easily with no drilling required;100% UV protected Dura-Flex 2000;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Stronger than factory ball joints for extreme off-road use.

node.long_desc: Sidewinder Elite 20K;Black powder coat;Rated for 20,000 lbs. capacity;Pivoting pin box design lets you hook up at nearly any angle;Improved, robust design adds increased stability and strength to support heavier loads;Automatic tracking;Effectively moves the trailer pivot position 22 rearward allowing for increased turning capability;Trailer tracks more closely to the tow vehicle while keeping the load centered over the axles;Tested for real world conditions, Sidewinder exceeds all Reese and SAE test standards;Included wedge fits all Reese 5th wheel hitches, all non-Reese hitch systems will require purchase of custom fit wedge kit;Virtually maintenance free"
node.sales_desc:
It's the ultimate short bed towing solution"! Reese Sidewinder is the premium pin box designed specifically for today's short bed pickups. With it's Patent pending design, it automatically eliminates turning and clearance headaches. Now you can make 90+ degree turns without ever exiting the truck.

By locking the trailer king pin to the 5th wheel hitch with the included wedge, the Sidewinder pin box effectively moves the trailer pivot position 22" rearward allowing for increased turning capability. Included wedge fits all Reese 5th wheel hitches. All non-Reese hitch systems will require purchase of custom fit wedge kit.
Note: Not all tow vehicle and trailer combinations will allow 90-degree turn."

node.long_desc: Available in black or green;7or 8-inch lengths available;100% 12-strand plasma single braid;Water, UV, and abrasion resistant polyurethane coating;Reduces stress;20 or 25,000 lbs breaking strength;2-year warranty;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Looking for the best, strongest and safest way to connect your Recovery Rope or Tow Strap to your vehicle? VooDoo Offroad Synthetic Rope Shackles are the perfect solution. This unique rope shackle is the most secure way to attach your VooDoo Offroad Kinetic Recovery Rope, or any tow strap, to a closed-loop anchor point on your vehicle. The one-piece construction means no pins to pull or D-Rings to fasten when getting ready to hook up and tow. With a maximum 20,000 pound breaking strength, VooDoo Offroad Synthetic Rope Shackles are stronger than comparable steel shackles. The one-piece, 1/2 Nylon rope construction makes the VooDoo Synthetic Rope Shackle flexible enough to wrap around most pulling points yet strong enough to withstand the most demanding situations. Made in the USA, VooDoo Offroad Rope Synthetic Rope Shackles are the safest, strongest way to hook yourself up and pull yourself out, so you can get out and Do What You Don't Dare To Do!"

node.long_desc: 2 Person capacity;Custom sized to fit between the wheel wells of all full-size pickup trucks;Built-in, hand-power air pump - no batteries or power needed;Durable constructions can hold up to 400 lbs;Flocked top prevents bedding from slipping;Includes a carrying bag for easy storage
node.sales_desc: Whether you're roughing it on the living room floor, or sleeping comfy in the back of your truck, the comfortable Sportz Air Mattress will have you sleeping soundly through the night.

node.long_desc: Portable, folding chair;Folds down for easy storage;Blue;Compact bag with strap for carrying;Built-in mesh cup holder;Includes carrying bag
node.sales_desc: This portable, folding chair is the perfect accessory to bring along on your next camping trip, to a sporting event, concert, tailgating or anywhere else the road may take you! The Napier Arm Chair folds down for easy storage and is conveniently packed into a compact bag with a strap for carrying. The perfect chair for every outdoor adventure.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Arsenal Sand on Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: Arsenal is Black Rhino's latest military inspired wheel with a modified tactical look. This innovative style combines the look of modern defense to bring an off-road character to the next level. The Arsenal exhibits a bolted face upon chiseled windows - a powerful look of force that is perfect for the adventure minded overland explorers. They set their sights to offer one of the most unique off road wheels from Black Rhino down to its unique center cap. This modern style really drills in the attitude of an indestructible, explosive-proof look to a whole new caliber. Their mission was to cover the best range of stock and lifted off highway vehicles, Arsenal offroad rims are available in 17x9.5, 18x9.5, 20x9.5 and 20x12 sizes. Offsets range from -44 to 12mm and five, six and 8-lug bolt patterns, including a 8/180 pattern for newer GMC and Chevrolet trucks.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Armory Desert Sand Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Armory is the brutal weapon of choice when your vehicle must absolutely be victorious in the next dangerous off road operation. Straight from a battlezone, this wheel is the right weapon of choice with its bolted face - a dramatic statement of power that is perfect for the regiment of adventure minded tuners. Black Rhino set their sights to offer one of the most unique off road wheels, down to its unique center cap. This tactical style affirmatively radars an indestructible quality of explosive-proof looks to a whole new caliber. The mission was to cover the best range of stock and lifted off highway vehicles, Armory off road rims are available in 17x9.5, 18x9.5, 20x9.5 and 20x12 sizes. Offsets range from -44 to 0mm and 5, 6 and 8-lug bolt patterns, including an 8/180 pattern for newer GMC and Chevrolet trucks. These truck rims sport huge lips to provide safe bead seating for oversized tires.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Alpine Gloss Black with Milled Spokes Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Alpine is a no-nonsense, serious off-road wheel for the aftermarket truck enthusiast. A gallant race truck inspired five-spoke features bold rectangles painted Gloss Black and is then CNC milled presenting a braun and brassy statement. The Alpine features a deep step lip designed and precisely measured around some of the truck markets' biggest brakes to guarantee fitment. Finishing off the wheel is a tough simulated beadlock with silver hex bolts and functional drain holes to prevent water and dirt from being trapped in the wheel. This is form and function wheel that is built with the valve stem guarded within the beadlock lip as well. Alpine is available in 17x9.5, 18x9.5 and 20x9.5 in high and low offsets finished exclusively in a Gloss Black with Milled spokes.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Arsenal Textured Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc:
Arsenal is Black Rhino's latest military inspired wheel with a modified tactical look. This innovative style combines the look of modern defense to bring an off-road character to the next level. The Arsenal exhibits a bolted face upon chiseled windows - a powerful look of force that is perfect for the adventure minded overland explorers. They set their sights to offer one of the most unique off road wheels from Black Rhino down to its unique center cap. This modern style really drills in the attitude of an indestructible, explosive-proof look to a whole new caliber. Their mission was to cover the best range of stock and lifted off highway vehicles, Arsenal offroad rims are available in 17x9.5, 18x9.5, 20x9.5 and 20x12 sizes. Offsets range from -44 to 12mm and five, six and 8-lug bolt patterns, including a 8/180 pattern for newer GMC and Chevrolet trucks.

It's not enough to be the best at off-road adventures. Your transportation should be elite, reflecting the strength and power that you possess. The right aftermarket accessories make that happen. To dominate the terrain and drive fiercely, purchase Black Rhino Arsenal Wheels from 4 Wheel Parts. This high-quality heavy-duty wheel reflects your reign on and off the road.

Take Command
Nature isn't easy. In fact, handling those rugged paths demands keen attention and a daring personality. Match that character with wheels that outshine the others. Black Rhino Wheels Arsenal is a military style wheel, designed to provide a superior ride with a tactical look. It's size and craftsmanship, from spacing and center cap, lets others know you can't be conquered. It's aluminum construction and textured black matte finish allows you to dictate the terrain.

Find the right one for your SUV or truck, searching through our mass stock. These all-powerful wheels are available in various sizes. Add them for a quiet, smooth ride that reflects the tenacity you possess.

Power At the Right
Made out of non-corrosive steel that is powder coated for extra protection against the elements to insure that your sound investment is secure and protected.

PUTCO's Venture TEC Modular Cargo System begins with a sleek bed rack designed to provide endless mounting options through its patent-pending TEC channel system. Constructed using high quality, lightweight 6061 t6 aluminum, this cargo system allows you to bring anything on-the-go!. The Venture TEC Modular Cargo System is engineered to mount to any truck. There are several different mounting options. The stake pocket mounts can be used for any truck with stake pockets and allow for the uninterrupted use of a tonneau Cover. There are options as well for non- stake pocket trucks. The Venture TEC MCS comes in different sizes to accomodate the many different truck options on the market.

node.long_desc: Universal application;Will only hold full steel doors;Sold as a pair;Made from steel;Black powder coat finish;Easy installation;Includes mounting hardware
node.sales_desc: Stop setting your Jeep doors on the ground and scratching the paint with our powder coated Door Hangers! Not only with they preserve the look of the doors, but they'll also clear up clutter from the ground around it, creating a neat and tidy look that's a must-have for any Jeep owner! Please Note : If you have cloth upper doors these will not work.

node.long_desc: Lightweight modular design reduces shipping costs without sacrificing strength;Increases ground clearance and angle of approach;Constructed of 10 gauge steel for strength and style;Mesh screen allows maximum air flow to intercooler or radiator area;Has provisions for factory sensors - on some applications;10 gauge steel valance included - on some applications;Valance features laser-cut Westin logo;Bolt-on skid plate available - sold separately;Compatible for facotry tow hooks - on some applications;Outrigger brackets support the wings of the bumper for maximum strength;Configured to accept most 30 LED light bars in the center position - sold separately;Removable screen allows use of optional round or square Outlaw LED light kits - sold separately;Hardware and mounting brackets included;E-coated base coat provides long lasting corrosion protection"
node.sales_desc: Westin's Pro-Mod Front Bumper combines enhanced vehicle protection, with great looks. Pro-Mod's revolutionary lightweight modular design is uniquely engineered with outrigger reinforcement brackets to provide maximum front end protection without compromising on strength, integrity or durability. The high and tight bumper profile creates a greater approach angle, which significantly improves off-road driving capabilities. The lightweight design also requires smaller shipping packages which dramatically reduces shipping costs. Pro-Mod bumpers feature a textured black finish with an e-coated base coat, providing long lasting corrosion protection from the elements. Once you see the Pro-Mod Front Bumper, the choice becomes obvious."

node.long_desc: Protects vehicle from damage against wildlife and road debris;Provides added safety to driver and vehicle;Heavy duty diamond plate steel;Constructed of schedule 40 steel pipe;Honeycomb mesh protects grille;Heavy duty 2 3/4 wide upright rubber strips;1 1/2" headlight protection tubes;2" tube full wraparound wings ties into bumper;Metal mesh screen allows maximum air flow to intercooler or radiator area;Built-in 2" receiver hitch;(2) Heavy duty 9,500 lbs bow shackle mounts;15/16" diameter shackle mount hole;Compatible for factory fog lamps or LED post mount lights;Custom die-cast riveted logo badge;Mounting provisions for license plate;Hardware and mounting brackets included;Bolt-on installation - no drilling required"
node.sales_desc: Westin's HDX Bandit Bumper combines a heavy duty diamond plate steel bumper constructed of schedule 40 steel pipe with a stylish grille guard featuring 2 diameter outer wraparound wings and 2 3/4" wide upright rubber strips. Designed to protect headlights, grille, hood and front fenders from road hazards, debris and wildlife damage. Features a stylish metal honeycomb mesh screen, which allows maximum airflow to the intercooler or radiator area while accenting the front end styling with a clean and rugged look. Removable mesh screens allow for factory camera and adaptive cruise control options available on some late model Ford applications. HDX Bandit Bumper includes a built-in 2" receiver hitch and (2) heavy duty 9,500 lbs bow shackle mounts, capable of delivering multiple towing options. Compatible for factory fog lamps or LED post mount lights. In addition, some late model Ram and Chevrolet applications feature provisions for factory parking sensors. Bolt-on installation with hardware and mounting brackets included. Available in black powder coat finish."

node.long_desc: Sold as a pair;Black powder coated aluminum;Designed to mount over OEM headlights;Provides extra protection from off-road trees and brush;Adds flare while keeping your vehicle 'legal'
node.sales_desc: Other than a bumper, the front end of any Jeep is rather bare. Add some flare and draw attention in style with our Aluminum Headlight Guards! Being exposed first hand to rocks, mud, and mother nature, these rust resistant guards grant extra protection to your vulnerable headlights.

node.display_name: American Truxx AT161 Web Black / Machined Wheels
node.sales_desc:
From the design and engineering stage, all the way to the expertly applied finishes, American Truxx wheels outshines the competition. Besides the standard chrome, polished, gloss and satin black finishes, American Truxx offers a creative brushed finish for their cast wheels that emulates the brushed metal look of raw forged wheels, giving customers who like the forged look a cost-effective option. And for those who want to step up to true forged wheels, American Truxx has them covered as well. All the benefits of added structural strength, durability, along with lighter weight, make forged the clear choice for performance-minded customers.

There are many choices out there for truck wheels. American Truxx's attitude and style are not the only things that set them apart. Their quality, and service are the best in the business. They stand behind their products because they are engineered to meet their exhaustive standards. Integrity and character are what they do when no one is looking. American Truxx strives to uphold the highest personal and professional values possible because their name and reputation are paramount to establishing authentic, lasting success.

node.long_desc: RockJock 4x4 Brake Line Relocation Bracket Kit allows the stock line to be removed from the vehicle, and bolted to the brackets with new supplied hardware;The brackets will be bolted back to the frame, and into the factory holes which use the factory bolts;One relocation tab for each corner of the vehicle as long with all the necessary mounting hardware;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: The RockJock Johnny Joint suspension system kit is a complete package that replaces all eight stock control arms and provides a 4in. lift. It is engineered to provide unrivaled articulating flexibility and performance in the most adverse off-road conditions. The Johnny Joint system keeps the tires in contact with the terrain for maximum traction.

The RockJock 4x4 Johnny Joint is the original urethane bushed spherical ball joint and still the undisputed leader in articulation and durability. The bushings in the Johnny Joint are made of a proprietary urethane that surrounds a smooth heat treated inner ball that rotates without binding, enabling Johnny Joints to last up to 10 times longer than the knock-off products that flood the market.

The RockJock 4x4 Johnny Joint is the original urethane bushed spherical ball joint and still the undisputed leader in articulation and durability. The bushings in the Johnny Joint are made of a proprietary urethane that surrounds a smooth heat treated inner ball that rotates without binding, enabling Johnny Joints to last up to 10 times longer than the knock-off products that flood the market.

node.long_desc: Dual Rate; Gloss Black Powder Coat; Sold As Pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Springs are custom made by RockJock to our exacting specs and are of a dual rate design. Gloss black powder coat finish. Sold as a pair.

For the Jeep enthusiast who wants improved steering control, the heavy duty Rancho RS5000 works on and off the road by absorbing shock loads transmitted from the front wheels to the steering system. The steering stabilizer is engineered for vehicles with oversized tires and wheels and helps reduce wheel shimmy, bump steer and vibration

node.long_desc: 1-5/8in. diameter 4130 chrome moly;Heat treated steel tubing tie rod and drag link tubes;1-1/4in. thread forged steel greasable tie rod ends;New steering stabilizer shock bracket and u-bolt kit;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The RockJock Currectlync heavy duty tie rod and drag link system features 1 5/8in. diameter 4130 chrome moly heat treated steel tubing tie rod and drag link tubes, 1 1/4in. thread forged steel greasable tie rod ends, as well as new steering stabilizer shock bracket and u-bolt kit The massive tie rod ends thread into the tie rod end body so that they may 1) be replaced without replacing the whole rod end saving cost, 2) the same threaded in tie rod end is used at all 4 points so only one spare would have to be carried, and 3) they may be unscrewed from the rod end bodies and screwed in from the other side if a flipped tie rod and/or drag link was desired. Tie rod and drag link tubes feature wrench flats machined onto them and jam nuts for ease of adjustment.

node.long_desc: D.O.T. Approved;Stainless Steel Brade Reinforced;Extended Length;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These are the D.O.T. approved stainless braided extended brake line kits from the Currie Enterprises RockJock off road suspension system.

node.long_desc: 2 Wire And 3 Wire Systems Available;Installs Cleanly Into The Vehicle's Taillights;T-Connectors Available For Most Popular Applications
node.sales_desc: T-Connectors wire directly into your vehicle's factory taillight to allow you to connect a trailer lighting and wiring system directly into your vehicle. This allows you to safely pull a trailer of any kind, as long as your vehicle can handle it. Having functioning trailer lights is also a requirement in many localities when towing, so the T-Connector allows you to stay legal wherever you might tow.

node.long_desc: Made of a high-performance polyurethane film that's virtually invisible;Door handle cups, door edges, door sills, trunk ledge protection;Created to perfectly fit your vehicle;Self-healing technology;Adheres directly to your vehicle's painted surface without damaging the paint;Includes easy-to-follow instructions;Made in the USA
node.sales_desc:
Take a quick look at your vehicle's door sills, chances are this is an area of your vehicle you don't pay a ton of attention to. Chances are also high that they're damaged. The same is likely true with your vehicle's door handle cups, door edges and even trunk ledges. Everyone of these areas take damage from rocks, keys, footwear and even just loading and unloading cargo. Don't let these areas of your vehicle go neglected any longer.

WeatherTech Scratch Protection is custom measured by our own engineers to precisely fit your vehicles's exact make and model, safe-guarding your vehicle from scratches, scuffs, dings and chips to your vehicle's door sills, door handle cups, door edges, and trunk ledges. Unlike some competitor products that use a generic one-size-fits-all approach, scratch protection is created to perfectly fit your exact vehicle providing complete protection against everyday wear and tear. Made of a high-performance polyurethane film that's virtually invisible, scratch protection adheres directly to your vehicle's painted surface without damaging the paint or finish. Featuring self-healing technology, scratch protection is durable enough to stand up to the toughest chips and scratches. Scratch protection is proudly made in the USA!

Rockstar Standard Smooth Mill Hitch Mounted Mud Flaps by Access, 1 Pair Mud Flaps and 1 Piece Hardware Mount Kits. Location: Rear. Campers, boats and trailers are all significant investments. What is it worth to you to protect yours from damaging road debris? Avoid costly repairs and retain maximum resale value of your boat, camper or trailer by investing in this product. Made model specific for the best possible fit, this hitch mounted mud flaps contour to fit your truck's bumper and act like a shield to deflect rocks and other road debris away from what you tow.

The K&N throttle control module is designed to improve throttle response and acceleration, and increases pedal sensitivity without modifying factory ECU settings. The system processes input data from the gas pedal, and modifies the signal before sending it to the ECU for an adjustable level of sensitivity, creating an increase in throttle responsiveness that will make your car feel like a whole new machine. The throttle control module can typically be installed in less than 30 minutes with no software required, and is adjustable on-the-go, helping you fine-tune the sensitivity of your throttle response. The kit includes the module, wiring harness, adjustable knob, hardware, and detailed instructions. How it works - The Throttle Control Module processes input data from the gas pedal, and modifies the signal before sending it to the ECU for an adjustable level of sensitivity, creating an increase in throttle responsiveness. Wire harness - The wire harness connects the Throttle Control Module's electronic control unit to the throttle pedal on the vehicle, allowing a direct connection between your gas pedal and throttle body. The plugs and connectors are designed to attach directly to your vehicle's stock components for easy plug-and-play installation. Control dial - The stylish aluminum control dial installs into the cab of your vehicle to give you direct control over your Throttle Control Module, allowing you to adjust how much or how little the throttle signal is adjusted.

node.long_desc: Incredible ride quality and performance;Monotube design;Internal floating piston;Nitrogen-charged;46mm high-flow piston;Fast heat dissipation;36kN tensile strength;Mounts inverted;T6061 brushed aluminum body;3-year manufacturer's warranty;Sold as a pair
node.sales_desc: Whether you're tackling tough terrain or smooth city streets, Rough Country's Nitrogen-charged V2 Monotube Shock Absorber leads the way, delivering impeccable ride quality and performance mile after mile. Rough Country's Monotube V2 Shocks feature an internal floating piston design that keeps the shock oil and high-pressure nitrogen separate. The result is a lightning-fast reaction with no cavitation - just unbridled vibration damping at each and every obstacle. The V2 Monotube Shock Absorber is more than an upgrade - it's a true performance shock. Each shock features a T6061 brushed aluminum body with black anodized accents giving it a striking visual appearance that also dissipates heat faster than other materials. The internal 46mm high-flow piston offers countless years of durability. The V2 is designed to be mounted body-up for a more interesting look on the vehicle.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Sport Cage Kit
node.long_desc: Compete .120 wall D.O.M. steel construction;Pre-coped and bent Tubing for easy welding;Precision laser cut and CNC press bent front cage attachments to floor and dash bar;Laser cut speaker grilles attach with included hardware;Made for generous head room while still being able to use a softop;Grab handles included for easy entry, exit and stability in the roughest off road environments;Complete metric hardware for installation included;Ships unpainted, ready to weld;Meets most Roll Cage regulations
node.sales_desc:
Low Range Off Road's own design of a Sport Cage. They manufactured these in house here in Utah, USA from DOM Steel. Why is DOM Steel Better? DOM is seamless tubing used to make roll cages, buggy chassis and drag racing chassis. It is drawn across a mandrel to be exactly the size it is determined to be. Since it goes across a mandrel it creates the weld seam to disappear, and pressures the steel in a way that is like a forging process for tubing. This means it is harder to crush and much less likely to break or bend in area's you need it the most.
Homemade cages have issues with doors closing correctly due to the nature of the tubing having to run down the side of the dash.

Low Range's Design department came up with a viable solution to this problem by making the attachment to the front portion of the cage by laser cut steel plate. With their unique design elements, the front doors shut correctly and do not ruin your nice paint job or your door panels. This also makes it easier to run your door straps.
Integrated into the design is a speaker grille that can easily be removed for speaker installation. Since this is also made from the same material, it protects your speakers from damage.

Many Rear cage portions have their benefits and drawbacks. Usually they require drilling into the floor of the body, causing an area for squeaks, rattles and a place for the elements to enter your cab. Low Range Off Road has fixed this by making the rear cage bolt into the floor of the tub. Utilizing a large floor plate, it spreads the load across a large area, creating a stong attachment point.

node.long_desc: Ultra-lightweight;Reusable;Coated with an anti-fog treatment;Protect your eyes from airborne droplets;ComfortPad made from medical grade soft elastomer;Easy adjustable headband and strap;Minimize face touching;Does not muffle your voice;Made in America
node.sales_desc:
Get the extra layer of security you need to comfortably go about your day with WeatherTech's Face Shield Air. Easy to assemble, it comes with an anti-fog lens and a ComfortPad that makes wearing it feel incredibly natural! The unique design allows air to circulate while giving you plenty of space to wear a mask underneath. Made in America, the Face Shield Air is customizable to fit virtually any head size! The lens comes in two lengths, adult and youth/teenage and small adult, so it's ideal for school activities and some sports, office workers, kitchen staff, air travel, the doctor's office, and much more.

Face Shield Air
Searching for an ultra-lightweight, reusable face shield that will keep you feeling secure and comfortable all day long? Look no further than the WeatherTech Face Shield Air. Protect your eyes from airborne droplets while allowing air to circulate around your face. Wear it with a mask you won't even notice it! The Face Shield Air consists of the Headband with ComfortPad, Strap and the Lens.

ComfortPad
ComfortPad is made from medical grade soft elastomer, and is ribbed for a gentle touch on your skin. It allows the Face Shield Air to rest softly on your forehead, while keeping it firmly in place without irritation or discomfort. It's also removable for easy cleaning. The ComfortPad is non-permeable, so it won't soak up sweat, dirt or makeup! Plus, it can be cleaned with a gentle dish soap and warm water.

Lens
Unlike other Face Shields, the Face Shield Air offers reusable lenses that are coated with an anti-fog treatment to give you a clear, unobstructed view at all times, no matter your activity. The three lenses included are also reversible and reusable - just gently wipe down with a soft, wet wipe, let air dry and snap back into place. Replacement lenses are sold separately.

Headband & Strap
The easy-to-adjust Headband & Strap allows Face Shield Air to fit virtually any head siz

node.sales_desc: Corbeau universal seat heating systems are among the highest quality seat-heating units available today. Those who have ever experienced the luxury of a seat heater know that once you've taken pleasure in a seat heater, it almost becomes a necessity. We've now made it possible to get a high quality seat-heating unit at an affordable price. Corbeau Seat Heaters can be installed in your Corbeau Seats or in your factory seats in a matter of minutes. While we always recommend you have these installed by a professional, the installation is really quite simple. Two wires, a positive and ground wire, connect to your factory electrical system. What's great about our heaters is they will heat up within two minutes. The patented heat flow system forces the heat from the heater to only go upward towards the body as opposed to a downward flow into the seat itself. This means your body will feel the majority of the heat flow and will warm up faster than most seat heaters. Corbeau Seat heating pads feature carbon fiber technology, which is regarded as one of the finest heating pad materials available today. Corbeau seat heaters are custom in that the heating pads can be trimmed to size to ensure proper fitment on your seat.

node.sales_desc: Belltech has developed the solution to correct the lackluster handling and performance of today's factory strut equipped trucks and SUV's, utilizing the next generation valving technology of our new Street Performance Shock line. In true Belltech style, combining our new leveling strut spacers with both front and rear Street Performance shock absorbers you receive a complete solution to level your stance and rejuvenate those worn out oem shocks and struts.

Belltech Hanger Kits are designed to minimally lower the rear of your leaf spring equipped Sport Truck or SUV. Belltech's redesigned Hangers reposition the front or rear leaf spring mounting points (spring eyes) so you can simply and effectively lower your leaf spring equipped Sport Truck or SUV without modifying or changing the factory leaf spring. This allows you to retain OEM ride quality and more importantly factory load capacity.

Front Springs - Belltech introduces an advanced lowering kit which includes high quality coil springs and vehicle specific upper spring or strut mount spacers.

Belltech Lowering Coil Springs have been engineered to provide the visual lowering you are looking for with the OEM quality that you have come to expect from Belltech. Unlike many other offerings on the market, Belltech specializes in not only ride comfort & quality, but increasing the handling performance of your Sport Truck or SUV as well.

Each coil is manufactured from chromium alloy steel and is wound, shot peened then powder coated to exact specifications to assure the proper ride height, ride quality and long life you have come to expect from Belltech products.

Speedometer calibration;Alters TPMS sensors;Activates daytime running lights; One-touch turn signals;Temporarily increased engine idle speed for winching;Clear engine codes;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: AEV's ProCal Module is a hand-held powerhouse! This essential tool provides JK owners an easy, low-cost way to make a variety of useful changes not offered by the dealer or any other re-programmer. Topping the list is the ability to correct the speedometer and gear ratio when larger tires are installed. When the speedometer is left uncorrected, there is a major degradation in the performance of the stability control (ESP), transmission shifting, and engine performance. The best part of the ProCal is that it isn't just for correcting the speedometer. The Tire Pressure Monitoring System can now be recalibrated to better suit aftermarket tires without triggering the dash light. Further, the ProCal Module makes it possible to activate daytime running lamps, one-touch turn signals, enable a temporarily increased engine idle speed for winching, clear engine codes, and even has a feature to help alignment technicians align the vehicle perfectly for optimal ESP performance. The ProCal Module is equipped with a series of easy-to-use DIP switches. By reading the simple Quick Reference Guide included with the ProCal module, a user can quickly dial in a code for the desired recalibration. Once the DIP switches are set, simply plug the Module into the vehicle's OBDII. The whole process can be completed in mere minutes and it's just as easy to restore the vehicle back to its original settings with the ProCal. NOTES: The AEV ProCal will enable axle gear ratio changes to be made to Wranglers equipped with the A580 Automatic transmission (2011+ 2.8L, 2012+ 3.6L) The AEV ProCal cannot change axle gear ratios for 2011+ 2.8L CRD diesel Wranglers with manual transmissions. See more in the FAQ. Key Features: Correct speedometer "One touch" turn signals Clear engine codes Easy to use DIP switches Recalibrate tire pressure monitor Increase engine idle speed Optimize ESP performance"

node.sales_desc: If you've seen your vehicles hood 'flutter' while cruising down the road at speed, it's likely because the stock hood latches have stretched or deteriorated. DV8's patented RocKlaw Hood Catch System are made from a rigid die-cast which eliminates the flutter. They are height-adjustable to allow for a precise tension. Our RocKlaw solution is finished in UV-resistant, semi-gloss black powder coating for maximum durability. Comes with high-quality stainless steel mounting hardware.

node.long_desc: Bestop's NX Plus Soft top for Jeeps - Runs as a fully-enclosed, all-season Wrangler soft top or remove the sides and rear window and enjoy it as a bikini;Easier-than-ever access to sunshine with the Sunrider design which allows the top to open from inside the vehicle;Improved fabric install and tensioning system (F.I.T.) on 4-door models for a tight, clean Jeep soft top look;Hybrid zipper/zipperless design utilizes patented zipperless technology to allow for easy removal of window panel while zippers on rear panel provide security and easy changes in configuration;Works with all factory half and full steel doors as well as Bestop door kits (sold separately);California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Trektop NX Plus brings a tight, clean fabric soft top look to your 2-door or 4-door Jeep. Run it as a fully-enclosed, all-season soft top for protection from the elements or remove the sides and rear window and enjoy it as a bikini allowing you to feel the breeze as you experience your outdoor adventure. Zippered pockets above the driver and passenger provide for organization of small gear items. Zipperless technology allows for an improved fit and easier installation. Use of the tailgate bar and clips allows for hassle-free opening of the tailgate. This improvement on the best-selling Trektop NX is a step-up in fit, quality and durability.

Available in great looking colors: Black Twill, Crushed Red Pepper, Navy Blue, Granite Gray, Oak Tan, and Pebble Beige. Please note: Available colors are accent colors only and chosen to complement Jeep body colors only -- not match them exactly.

node.display_name: Icon Alloys UTV-SPEC Compression Satin Black Wheels
node.long_desc: Sizes Available: 15;Bolt Patterns: 4 lug;Finish: Satin Black;Max Load: 1600 lbs"
node.sales_desc:
ICON Alloys is excited to announce the arrival of our first wheel design to hit the powersports market, the UTV-Spec Compression'. Combining sharp lines, concave spoke design, a true beadlock, and ICON-optimized" dimensions, this new wheel is designed not only to improve the looks of your SxS, but the overall function as well. Available in Satin Black, Bronze, and Titanium finishes with black beadlock bolts, the Compression has a style that is anything but ordinary.

The UTV-Spec Compression features a knurled beadlock ring (with Grade 10.9 hardware) to provide excellent tire retention and a ribbed inner mating surface for a proper seal. In an effort to avoid potential trail damage the valve stem is placed between the spokes for outstanding protection. Backspace and wheel offset dimensions have been strategically developed to optimize wheel position, improving all-around handling and performance. The ICON Alloys Compression has also been strength tested to yield a 1,600lb load rating - making it one of the strongest wheel options on the market! With build features such as these, it's clear that a set of ICON Alloys Compression wheels is the perfect choice for your UTV."

node.display_name: Icon Alloys UTV-SPEC Compression Titanium Wheels
node.long_desc: Sizes Available: 15;Bolt Patterns: 4 lug;Finish: Titanium;Max Load: 1600 lbs"
node.sales_desc:
ICON Alloys is excited to announce the arrival of our first wheel design to hit the powersports market, the UTV-Spec Compression'. Combining sharp lines, concave spoke design, a true beadlock, and ICON-optimized" dimensions, this new wheel is designed not only to improve the looks of your SxS, but the overall function as well. Available in Satin Black, Bronze, and Titanium finishes with black beadlock bolts, the Compression has a style that is anything but ordinary.

The UTV-Spec Compression features a knurled beadlock ring (with Grade 10.9 hardware) to provide excellent tire retention and a ribbed inner mating surface for a proper seal. In an effort to avoid potential trail damage the valve stem is placed between the spokes for outstanding protection. Backspace and wheel offset dimensions have been strategically developed to optimize wheel position, improving all-around handling and performance. The ICON Alloys Compression has also been strength tested to yield a 1,600lb load rating - making it one of the strongest wheel options on the market! With build features such as these, it's clear that a set of ICON Alloys Compression wheels is the perfect choice for your UTV."

node.long_desc: Sizes Available: 17;Bolt Patterns: 5 lug;Finish: Titanium;Max Load: 2750 lbs"
node.sales_desc: The ICON Alloys VECTOR wheel incorporates sharp lines and an aggressive spoke design while a featureless lip provides clean looks and makes care & maintenance an easier task (doesn't trap debris as easily). Combining these bold looks with ICON optimized dimensions, the Vector is designed to improve the form and function of your truck or SUV. Backspace and wheel offset dimensions have been strategically developed to reduce scrub radius, enhancing handling characteristics and ride quality - this is truly a wheel designed with suspension in mind"."

node.long_desc: Dual-rate coil springs front and rear guaranteed never to sag;Stainless steel high-steer taper adapter eliminates drilling the factory knuckle;Out-handles most JK kits on the market both on and off-road;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: Available in Stubby or Full Width;Engineered to mount most any aftermarket winch;Built-in jack lifting points at every corner;Massive recovery hooks, each one dual-drilled to work with both 3/4 and 7/8-inch shackles;Satin black powder coat finish;Limited 5-year warranty
node.sales_desc: Make sure that your Jeep is as tough as any trail you're likely to tackle. Plastic bumpers might look good, but run into anything more than bug guts and you'll see why you need the strength of steel on your rig. That's why we recommend you keep the flimsy plastic in the picnic basket, not on your Jeep. Rugged Ridge HD Series Bumpers are trail-tested, proven designs that pack a serious punch. Whether you prefer the narrow, agile angles of our HD Stubby Front Bumper or the burly look of the Full-Width, you will love the aggressive off-road presence they provide. Engineered to mount most any aftermarket winch for greater versatility and well-equipped to perform in the clutch with built-in jack lifting points at every corner and massive recovery hooks, each one dual-drilled to work with both 3/4 and 7/8-inch shackles (shackles not included). We've even designed an HD Rear Bumper to go out back, for a highly-functional, total bumper package. Add a beautiful satin black powder coat finish and the confidence of our Limited 5 Year Warranty and the choice becomes clear. Rugged Ridge HD Bumpers are the best-built bumpers in their price classor any class.

node.long_desc: S&B Filters Tool Trays
node.sales_desc: S&B Filters Tool Trays

BajaRack was created as a rugged solution for the adventurer that likes to go beyond the trail. Our equipment gives you the ability to safely and in style transport your gear to its destination. Like many companies, BajaRack started with engineers that like the outdoors and the challenge of the many climates Baja offers. Tired of buying equipment that would break under Baja's extraordinary conditions, we decided to build our own equipment that would withstand one of the most outrageous races in the world the Baja 1000.

node.long_desc: Includes billet aluminum spacer; Hardware
node.sales_desc: It is necessary to lower the driveshaft carrier bearing to reduce driveline angles. This beautifully machined, billet aluminum spacer from RockJock fits between the factory carrier bearing and the frame and includes new, longer hardware for installation.

node.sales_desc: Bilstein B6 shock absorbers and struts are the ideal choice for improving the performance of any vehicle. These shock absorbers and struts feature a monotube design which provides consistent fade free performance. Bilstein B6 shock absorbers and struts utilize a unique, velocity sensitive, digressive piston which reacts to changing road conditions to provide consistent fade free performance. All B6 shock absorbers and struts are tuned for each specific application to assure optimal performance is achieved. Bilstein B6 shock absorbers and struts offer a significant improvement in ride quality, handling, and comfort.

Adjustable range .6-2.5in;60mm remote reservoir for increased oil capacity and cooling;High quality chrome 5/8 heim joint mounting with rubber sealed misalignment spacers offer the most durable, load bearing mount solution;Factory rebuildable;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: BILSTEIN B8 8112 (ZoneControl CR) suspension kits incorporate a new, revolutionary technology, delivering position sensitive damping in both compression and rebound. ZoneControl CR provides unparalleled comfort during everyday driving conditions, combined with maximum control under large suspension inputs. BILSTEIN B8 8112 (ZoneControl CR) suspension kits will enhance your suspension performance to a level that will defy convention.

node.long_desc: Manufactured out of 16 gauge cold rolled steel;Finished in signature series two stage black powder coat;Drawer supports up to 220 pounds;High grade steel sliders offer smooth operation;Lockable storage system;Ergonomically designed aluminum handle;Dimensions 34.5 x 28" x 13;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Storage and security is the number one concern for all Jeepers and now you have an option with our all new storage vault for the Jeep Wrangler & Unlimited. Each box is manufactured out of 16 gauge cold rolled steel and is powder coated in Smittybilt's signature series two stage black powder coat. The solidly built, the drawer supports up to 220 pounds, these high-grade steel slides offer smooth, quiet operation for some of your heaviest applications. A positive stop prevents drawers from accidentally rolling open, while the trigger disconnect allows for simple drawer removal. When you want the best in storage technology, look to Smittybilt to have your storage solution.

node.display_name: Kansei KNP Off Road Bronze Wheels
node.long_desc: Sizes: 17;Bolt Patterns: 5 & 6 lug;Finish: Bronze;Max Load: 2250 lbs"
node.sales_desc:
Built for The Untamed, The Kansei KNP wheel is going off road and continues to utilize their Formlite construction process along with many built in features to keep the adventure going. Asymmetrical tire bead humps to help keep your tires mounted when running low air pressure.

The KNP is the perfectly balanced 5 spoke wrapped in a classic stepped lip. Each KNP Off Road size features a concave face and is big brake compatible while maintaining strong and lightweight construction.

Key Features Include:
Reinforced Inner Rim Lip
Asymmetrical tire bead humps to help with low pressure
Formlite Rim Barrell Strengthening Process
Big brake clearances
Low profile color matched cap
TPMS Compatibility
