node.long_desc:
Off-Road Durability
  • Protects against impacts and punctures for ultimate peace of mind.
  • Multiple sidewall plies, a high turn-up carcass and full nylon cap improve durability and puncture resistance.
  • Thick sidewall protectors guard against impacts and punctures.

Long Tread Life
  • Optimized contact area and unique compound provide flatter footprint and longer tread life.
  • Provides an optimal balance of off-road traction and long, even wear.
  • Provides reliable, long tread life and impressive cut and chip resistance.

Quiet Ride
  • Distinctive tread grooves dramatically reduce pattern and road noise for a smooth, quiet ride in the segment.
  • Reduces pattern and road noise for a smooth, quiet ride.
  • Interrupt airflow to limited pattern and noise, ensuring a quieter and more comfortable ride.

Off-Road Traction
  • Specially-engineered tread pattern provides strength and grip no matter how rugged the road.
  • Angular offset center blocks provide increased strength and grip when you need it most.
  • Sipes and narrow grooves are combined on each tread block to provide traction on wet, snow and slick rock surfaces.
  • Large shoulder blocks varied in length create biting edges and promote mud and stone ejection.
node.sales_desc: From peak to pavement and everywhere in between, the GEOLANDAR X-AT is built to conquer serious off-road terrain without compromising on-road comfort. And with a 45,000-Mile Limited Treadwear Warranty, a quieter ride and unique dual sidewall design, the GEOLANDAR X-AT provides extreme versatility so you can go farther with confidence.

node.long_desc:
Extreme Off-Road Traction
  • High void-to-lug ratio and deep side blocks provide game-changing traction on even the steepest climbs.
  • Provide exceptional sidewall protection and assist in crawling through the toughest terrain.
  • Tread blocks are optimized for extreme off-road traction, superior crawling performance and self-cleaning capabilities.

Off-Road Durability
  • With GEO-SHIELD construction wrapped in a high-density compound, hazardous terrain will never look the same.
  • Built to take the punishment of even the most severe off-road terrain with a full nylon cover, multiple sidewall plies and extra-thick sidewall protection.

Long Tread Life
  • High-density, triple-polymer tread compound produces slow, even wear.
  • Provides exceptional wear and off-road traction while resisting cuts and chips.

Quiet Ride
  • Optimized tread pattern reduces pattern noise for a quieter, more comfortable on-road ride.
  • Unique block pattern and pitch variation reduce pattern noise for a quieter, more comfortable ride on the road.
node.sales_desc: Engineered for today's hardcore rock-crawlers, the GEOLANDAR X-MT demands respect on any trail. Constructed with GEO-SHIELD technology, this proud addition to the GEOLANDAR lineup delivers relentless off-road grip, ruthless performance and the strength to get you to the top and keep you there.

node.long_desc:
Off-Road Traction
  • An innovative tread pattern and triple-polymer compound provide outstanding grip wherever you venture.
  • Provides outstanding off-road grip and shorter stopping distances on wet roads.
  • Protect against stone drilling and keep the grooves clear and improve off-road traction.

Off-Road Durability
  • Rock-solid GEO-SHIELD construction is engineered to withstand punishment from even the most brutal trail.
  • Multiple sidewall plies, a full nylon cap, and high turn-up carcass assure merciless traction and reliable protection.
  • Creates a bold, new look while delivering off-road traction and protection from side impacts.

Quiet Ride
  • Advanced pitch variation contributes to a quieter, comfortable highway ride.
  • Engineered to provide a quieter ride on the highway.

Long Tread Life
  • High-density triple-polymer compound and wide, flat profile combine for exceptional wear performance.
  • Wide flat profile distributes stresses more evenly across the entire tread area for longer wear.
node.sales_desc: Conquering the off road is as much about conquering your fears as it is the terrain. The GEOLANDAR M/T G003 is engineered with rock-solid GEO-SHIELD technologies from casing to tread. GO STRONG with crushing performance, intimidating looks, and an industry-leading tread life.

node.long_desc:
Competitive All-Weather Traction
  • Severe snow service-rated (3PMSF) for confident wet and winter traction.
  • Change shape as the tread wears to maintain biting edge for confident four-season traction.
  • Expel water from beneath the tread to help prevent hydroplaning.
  • Create more biting edges for traction in snow.

Long Tread Life
  • A flatter profile and enduro compound designed to deliver longer treadwear and increased tread life.
  • Features proprietary polymers to resist wear for longer mileage.
  • Flat and wide profile evenly distributes weight to combat premature, uneven wear.

Off-Road Durability
  • Dependable off-road performance from a sturdy, Endurocore construction.
  • Optimized for added durability on vehicles that carry heavy loads.

On/Off Road Traction
  • Advanced tread design provides capable off-road traction while staying quiet on the highway.
  • Reduces road noise for a quieter, more comfortable ride.

Yokohama PromiseUp to 60,000 mile limited treadwear warranty and 30-day trial satisfaction guarantee.
node.sales_desc: When the road ends, the fun begins. The GEOLANDAR A/T G015 is the ideal all-terrain tire for all weather conditions, delivering a perfect blend of on- and off-road performance, capability and comfort for drivers of today's light trucks and SUVs.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Peak Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc:
PEAK truck wheels by Black Rhino. The PEAK is a sleek six spoke with smooth accent lines in the center of each spoke. To add to the look each spoke rolls back with a nice concave to give that sporty feel. When you are looking at the top, reach for the PEAK for your Truck and SUV. Available in 20,22" in Matte Black or Gloss Black with a Mirror Cut Face. Each Black Rhino wheel is engineered to carry the heavy loads often associated with Trucks and SUV's. All wheels are either hub-centric or supplied with centering rings to ensure a smooth vibration free ride. PEAK truck wheels by Black Rhino.

The Peak Rotary Forged Wheel is manufactured using a highly advanced production technique called Rotary Forging. The rim of the wheels is forged at high pressure while the wheel is spun at high speed. This alters the molecular structure and enhances the strength of the alloy. The benefit is a much lighter weight than a regular cast wheel. Most importantly, the weight saving is in the outer rim of the wheel which dramatically reduces rotational mass and enhances vehicle performance."

PONDORA truck wheels by Black Rhino. The Pondora is a straight cut six spoke with a small step groove accenting each spoke. Each spoke moves with prowess to meet with a nice machine cut lip. Much like the luxurious wild gaming park Pondoro in South Africa, after which the wheel is named, the PONDORA fits the bill of classy with a touch of raw toughness. Built for Trucks and SUV's and available in 20,22",24" in Gloss Black with Machine Cut Lip, Silver with Machine Cut Face & Lip, Chrome. Each Black Rhino wheel is engineered to carry the heavy loads often associated with Trucks and SUV's. All wheels are either hub-centric or supplied with centering rings to ensure a smooth vibration free ride. PONDORA truck wheels by Black Rhino."

node.display_name: Black Rhino Predator Gloss Black with Milled Windows Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino truck and SUV wheels lineup is built with two types of vehicles in mind: The first set-up was built with a negative offset that works perfectly with your Truck or SUV with that Extreme lift. This provides your Off Road Beast with an aggressive stance that these vehicles demand. The second is your more street friendly vehicle that you want to give that stylish look to set it apart from all other vehicles. The wheels offset is more positive and will still allow you to use it on your vehicle with a mild lift or stock appearance. The wheels come in a variety of 17, 18", 20" 22" and 24" sizes in a variety of finishes - Gloss Gunmental, Matte Black w/Machine Face & Dark Matte Tint, Matte Black w/Matte Graphite Lip, Matte Black, Gloss Black with Machine, Matte Black with Matte Machine, 5, 6 and 8 Lug, all depending on what perfectly suits your Truck or SUV. So if you have a 12" lift with Dual Shocks or you have that aggressive Street Truck, Black Rhino Off Road Truck wheels and SUV wheels are the ones for you."

node.long_desc: Silica-reinforced tread compound and siping for all weather performance, cut/chip resistance, and longevity;High-tensile 2-ply body cord for increased durability with reduced weight and improved ride;Variable draft angles and tread edge chamfers help to reduce stone retention;Angled shoulder scallops and two-pitch SideBiter pattern for off road traction;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Industry-leading 60,000 Mile (P Metric sizes) and 55,OOO-mile (LT Sizes) Limited Tread Wear Warranty! Mickey Thompson is proud to introduce the new Deegan 38 All-Terrain. With its open-void allterrain tread pattern, proprietary compound and durable cnstruction, the Deegan 38 All-Terrain is an excellent upgrade for today's pickups and SUVs. Silica-Reinforced Tread Compound and Siping for all weather performance, cut/chip resistance, and longevity. High-Tensile 2-Ply Body Cord for increased durability with reduced weight and improved ride. Variable Draft Angles and Tread Edge Chamfers help to reduce stone retention. Angled Shoulder Scallops and Two-Pitch SideBiter Pattern for off road traction.

node.long_desc: IPX5 Premium, Grizzly Roto-molded construction, heavy-duty ice chest cooler;56 quart drink capacity or 72 12 oz. cans;180 Watt (90 Watts x 2 RMS) stereo sound;2-way component speaker system with 5.25 water resistant speakers and 4 x 8" bass radiators;Illuminated control panel with volume up/down and power/pairing source buttons;A2DP Bluetooth Wireless 4.1 audio streaming;Grizzly molded-in heavy duty hinge construction with BearClaw latching system;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Whether tailgating, camping or hanging by the lake with friends, Alpine ICE (In-Cooler Entertainment) PWD-CB1 provides quality audio entertainment while doubling as a premium, high-capacity Bluetooth enabled cooler. The deceptively powerful speaker system is engineered and tuned to create a deep impact and fill any space with incredibly rich, intoxicating sound while the Grizzly engineered constructed cooler body keeps your food and drinks on ice for the long haul. Alpine ICE also gives you the flexibility of using power sources such as a vehicle battery or an external portable power supplies, so that youre not reliant on an internal battery with a short lifespan. This first-of-its-kind cooler is the perfect addition to any outdoor event. It is truly designed for music and built for adventure.

node.sales_desc: The Universal fit Seat Heater elements are paper thin Patented Carbon Fiber, and install between the seat cover material and the seat cushion. They are fully water-resistant and pose NO problem with damp winter clothes, spilled beverages, or wet pets! Key Features: Built-in thermostat with HI/LOW settings (95/115 degrees). Upper and Lower Cut-to-fit Heating Pads, Universal fit any make or model, 2 wire hook-up. Kit includes: 2-11 x 11 Heater Panels (for one seat), Three way (off, Low, High) switch, Prewired relay harness with fuse, 24 power leads to seat Harness. Kits are sold each (one seat), 3 year / 36,000 mile warranty.
Beef up the frame and Front Control Arm Sport Brackets on your Jeep Wrangler. Prevents unwanted bending or breaking under extreme conditions.

node.display_name: Pro Comp 75 Series Trilogy Race Super Machined Alloy Wheels
node.long_desc: The next-generation Pro Comp Beadlock Wheel is here to take on the most extreme terrain imaginable;Wheel Size: 17 inch diameter;Bolt pattern: 5, 6 and 8 Lug Design;Finish: Super Machined;Look no further, Pro Comp is your one-stop Manufacturer for truck and Jeep wheels;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The next-generation Pro Comp Beadlock Wheel is here to take on the most extreme terrain imaginable. Available in satin black or super machined finishes, the new eight-spoke design yields a classic hardcore look. But the Pro Comp Trilogy Race beadlock wheel is way more than just a pretty face. Engineered to be a full 27% stronger than the previous version, it brings race-level performance to the masses. A completely redesigned bead ring is double the thickness of the original and forged from 6061 aircraft-grade aluminum. Fully countersunk Grade 8 bolts stay protected from rocks, impacts and abuse while NORDLOCK washers ensure that the ring hardware stays properly torqued. The new ring also uses a specialized 45-degree diamond knurl pattern while the bead area of the wheel features Pro-Comp's patented Infini-Grip figure eight pattern. Together they form a super team of grip that keeps the bead locked securely in place regardless of air pressure or impacts. Already battle tested in the harsh deserts of the Baja 1000 and the jagged rocks of King of the Hammers, the next-generation Pro Comp Beadlock wheel can be trusted to thrive in the most extreme environments. Air down and conquer with the new Pro Comp Trilogy Race Beadlock wheel.

node.display_name: Pro Comp 63 Series Recon Satin Black Milled Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Pro Comp Recon Wheel is designed using State-Of-The-Art Low-Pressure-Casting Technology providing unsurpassed wheel strength, style and value. Pro Comp Alloys are amongst the highest load rated wheels in the industry, ranging from 2500 LBS to 3650 LBS per wheel. Pro Comp Alloy Wheels combine a light weight, head turning style available in a wide range of finishes and offer The Pro Comp Promise; the only transferable warranty in the industry.

node.display_name: Pro Comp 62 Series Apex Satin Black Milled Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Pro Comp Apex is designed using State-Of-The-Art Low-Pressure-Casting Technology providing unsurpassed wheel strength, style and value. Pro Comp Alloy Wheels combine a light weight, head turning style available in a wide range of finishes and offer The Pro Comp Promise; the only transferable warranty in the industry.

PRP's Steering Wheels are Built for Off-Road. Constructed from high strength aluminum, with a matte black finish for extra durability and to make it look cool. The steering wheel has 6 point bolt pattern, specifically chosen because it fits the majority of aftermarket quick releases. Comes with a PRP emblem plate. Available in four different colors.

node.display_name: Rhino-Rack Roof Rack LED Light Brackets
node.long_desc: Fits the entire size range of Rhino-Rack Pioneer Trays and Platforms;Attach your Spot Lights to the Front or Rear of the Pioneer Platform or Tray;Flexible, sliding channel mount attachment adds versatility;Made from strong, non-corrosive powder coated steel;Simple installation
node.sales_desc: Made from strong Powder Coated Steel the Pioneer LED Light Bracket fits the entire Rhino-Rack Pioneer range of Trays, Elevations and Platforms. Secure your LED Light to the specifically designed Rhino-Rack Pioneer range and don't let your work or fun be held back by a lack of light. The Powder Coated Steel LED Light Bracket will hold up to all tough weather conditions and resist corrosion and damage on your wildest adventure. Secure your Spot Light to any area of the Rhino-Rack Pioneer range with the flexible, sliding channel mount attachment. Don't let your work or fun be held back by a lack of light.

node.long_desc: Quick release over centre cam for a quick and easy adjustment;Allows the profile to be minimised to 130mm;Sold as a pair;It's a great little accessory that is recommended for use if carrying multiple elongated item
node.sales_desc: Whether you want an easy way to carry fishing rods in summer or ski poles in winter the Rhino-Rack Multi Purpose Holder is the best choice on the market. The strong, glass-reinforced nylon material of this product has a load rating of up to 7kg (15.5lb). There isn't another adventure accessory that can match the simplicity of installation and ease of use. Wrap the Multi Purpose Holder around your Vortex or Heavy Duty bars like a wristwatch, attach the strap, place your fishing rod, ski poles, kayak paddles, shovel, sail board mast or much more into place, strap up and get on the road quick.

node.long_desc: Connecting to your vehicle's roof via 2 bases on each side;Allows for a Rhino-Rack Pioneer System to be fitted on top
node.sales_desc: Connecting to your vehicle's roof via 2 bases on each side, it allows for a Rhino-Rack Pioneer System to be fitted on top.

node.long_desc: Easy to install;Creates extra room inside your vehicle for family and friends;Securely fixes the spare wheel to your roof;Suitable for light off-road use;Transport your spare wheel outside your vehicle;Easy to mount;Made from strong ultra-light materials
node.sales_desc:
If you're an avid camper or like to travel distances in your 4WD, you will know that a spare wheel is one of the essential items you need to bring with you. Rhino-Rack has developed a spare wheel holder for our range of Pioneer Systems and Alloy Trays. Save the room in your vehicle for more passengers and put that spare wheel securely on the roof with the Spare Wheel Holder.

No longer will you need to find the space inside your car to fit a large, bulky wheel. Free up that space by securely mounting it to the top of your vehicle on our Pioneer Platforms, Pioneer Trays, Pioneer Elevations and Alloy Trays using the Spare Wheel Holder.

The unit is easy to fit using a one piece clamping unit. It's made from strong ultra-light materials and comes with a 3 year warranty.

node.long_desc: Measures 47 (L) x 31" (W);Strong and lightweight;Great for securing noisy tarps so you can drive in peace;Easy fitting for quick loading and unloading;Suitable with the large or extra large steel mesh baskets"
node.sales_desc: The Luggage Net is an accessory designed to be used with Rhino-Rack Steel Mesh Baskets and Tie-Down Straps. Simply latch the hooks over your cargo and rest assured it will be there when your driving is done for the day. The Luggage Net is made from ultra-strong and ultra-light materials that will compact and tightly secure your load.

node.display_name: Rhino-Rack VA Underside Tie Down Points
node.long_desc: Two tie down points are supplied to be used for a single bar;Creates secure tie down points for your straps;Prevent tie down straps from slipping off your crossbars;Fitting hardware is supplied
node.sales_desc:
The VA Underside Tie Down Point is the perfect accessory to compliment your Rhino-Rack Vortex crossbar system by creating a secure tie down point for your straps.

Being discretely installed on the underside of the crossbar frees up space on top to carry items, especially for wider loads. You can rest assured that by using the VA Underside Tie Down Points, your tie down straps will not slip off the outer edges of the crossbar if your load moves.

The Rhino-Rack RL Leg Brackets are specially designed heavy duty legs to fit to gutter mounts on a vehicle. RL Legs come in a variety of shapes designed to fit specific vehicles. There are four main leg heights depending on how much clearance your roof racks need. RL legs come in 110mm, 150mm, 210m and 280mm heights.

node.long_desc: Made from tough and durable materials. (ABS/ASA = Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene / Acrylic Styrene Acrylonitrile);Sleek and aerodynamically designed to reduce wind drag;Opening available on both sides with key included;MasterFit Technology allows for quick and easy setup;440L capacity and long enough to carry most outdoor equipment;2x metal reinforcement profiles under the bottom of the box;Comes with 2 load securing straps
node.sales_desc:
With a Rhino-Rack MasterFit Roof Box you can conveniently carry more on road trips and on off road trips. The 4WD Off Road Proven Roof Box can carry a huge 75kg, around 25kg / 55lb more than other brand roof boxes.

Our unique MasterFit Technology means you can quickly and safely fit the box by using a revolutionary Twist to Tighten & Press to Lock clamping system that just about anyone can use and as an added bonus they don't take up much space at all. Aerodynamically designed and built from tough and durable materials, the RMFT440 will fit directly to your Rhino-Rack Vortex and Euro systems and will require the RUBK-MF fitting kit to attach onto your Heavy Duty bars.

The minimum crossbar spacing required is 620mm and the maximum is 930mm.The maximum roof load of your car as specified by the car manufacturer must not be exceeded. The total roof load consists of; the weight of the Roof box, the weight of the roof racks and the weight of the Roof box contents.

node.display_name: Rhino-Rack Rapid Straps with Buckle Protectors
node.long_desc: Strap length: 15 or 18ft;LIncludes a design registered Buckle Protector;Buckle protector is made from injection molded TPV rubber;Helps avoid creating dents/scratches/marks on your vehicle or load
node.sales_desc: The Rapid Straps are suitable for heavy duty use and feature a unique design registered unique Buckle Protector. Designed to encase the metal cam buckle, the Buckle Protector is made from injection molded, TPV rubber and provides maximum protection to avoid denting, scratching or marking any of your gear or vehicle. This item also includes a sewn in Velcro Roll it Strap to keep the strap neatly stowed on its own.

node.long_desc: For use with Rhino-Rack Pioneer Systems;Alloy construction with cast steel hinges;Wide feet (70mm / 2.7) are perfect for use on soft ground;Adjustable feet extend to 325mm (19.7") to ensure stability on uneven ground;Maximum ladder length 2325mm (91.5");Maximum load rating of 125kg (275lb);Ladder folds to 1060mm (41.7");Locking pin fitted to the ladder with a flexible cable;Angled to prevent contact with vehicle;Mounting brackets and hardware included;Additional brackets sold separately, part numbers 43217 and RUFLB"
node.sales_desc:
The Aluminium Folding Ladder connects to the edge of your Pioneer Systems using a specific mounting bracket fixed with bolts for added stability. The mounting bracket can be installed on any side of the vehicle as desired. The ladder unfolds at an angle to prevent contact with your vehicle.

Constructed from Aluminium with a black powder coat finish, the Aluminium Folding Ladder is built strong and durable to last a lifetime without rusting. The ladder folds down to 1060mm for compact storage and can be used with RUFLB for convenient storage outside the vehicle.

node.long_desc: Set of 2 or 4;New standard end cap that comes with the Rhino-Rack Vortex crossbars;Prevents theft of the accessories mounted to your crossbar to give you peace of mind;Comes with locking end caps and keys
node.sales_desc: The Vortex Secure Core locking end cap is the new standard end cap that comes with the Rhino-Rack Vortex crossbars. The locking mechanism prevents theft of the accessories mounted to your crossbar to give you peace of mind. The VA-SEC2 comes with 2 locking end caps and 1 key. The VA-SEC4 comes with 4 locking end caps and 2 keys.

node.long_desc: Available in 22, 28 and 33-inch lengths;Extremely easy to install and remove;Cost effective way to protect your roof racks;Manufactured from high quality closed cell EVA foam;Includes a pair of padded tie down straps;UV protected;Sold as a pair
node.sales_desc:
Protect your roof racks from damage when loading and unloading your surfboard, canoe, kayak, paddleboards, etc with the Rhino-Rack 550mm Universal Wrap Pads.

The wrap pads are designed to fit snuggly around most common roof rack systems using a very strong and simple Velcro design.

Sold in a pair for your front and rear crossbars, the RWP03 velcro wrap pads also come with a pair of padded tie down straps to safely secure your watercraft.

node.long_desc: Pitman Arm;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: MOOG Problem Solver products incorporate proven design and engineering features for like new steering, ease of installation and longer life. MOOG is the preferred steering and suspension parts brand of professional technicians and NASCAR(R) Crew Chiefs. Problem Solver powdered metal gusher bearing design enables grease to flow through the bearing to the stud for reduced friction and enhanced strength and stability. Problem Solver patented cover plate design allows for tighter tolerances vs traditional cover plate designs, providing a more durable and extended life part. Full ball metal stud provides 360 degrees of smooth, consistent, rotational movement resulting in more responsive steering. Patent pending Sunoloy coated metal bearings provide smooth stud swing technicians and drivers prefer.

node.display_name: ITP SD Dual Beadlock Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The SD Dual Beadlock is an aluminum wheel with exceptional strength. Industry Leading Performance, ITP tires and wheels meet the demands of today's off-road enthusiasts by delivering unequalled traction, precise handling and exceptional durability to overcome the world's most challenging terrain. In the lab and on the test field, the ITP team works hands-on to ensure that each tire made outperforms the competition. The imaginative engineering team at ITP continually pushes the envelope with tire-and-wheel innovations that answer demands for new vehicle introductions, durability requirements and fitment upgrades. ITP is the World's #1 ATV / UTV Aftermarket Tire & Wheel Source and is dedicated to always improving your off-road riding experience. We will continue to deliver the finest ATV, UTV and SxS tires and wheels in the industry. ITP is pleased to adhere to your strict standards and promise to meet your expectations. Since 1982, ITP has been the world's #1 ATV / UTV aftermarket tire and wheel source. The premier ITP products are developed utilizing an experienced staff of engineers, designers and technicians at its two American tire facilities in Clinton, Tennessee, and Jackson, Tennessee, to develop award-winning tire-and-wheel designs for virtually all ATVs and side-by-side vehicles.

node.long_desc: Helps eliminate cold start problems;Improves idle and off-throttle fuel delivery problems;Designed as a supplemental fuel source to a carburetor;Fits Quadrajet style carburetors;Reads air/fuel ratio via a wideband O2 sensor in exhaust;User defined parameters for full adjustability;Works with all fuel types and nitrous;Effective in race, street, and marine applications
node.sales_desc: The K&N Electronic Carburetor Injection (ECI) system is the solution to every day carburetor issues. Using an included wideband O2 sensor, the system reads the air/fuel ratio in the exhaust and adds fuel if a lean condition is detected. Say goodbye to cold start issues, pumping the gas, priming, and flooding. It will also help support carburetors that have issues during idle and off-throttle conditions. The kit comes with the ECI carburetor plate, fuel block with fuel injector, weatherproof ECU, wire harness, O2 sensor, and all the gaskets and hardware required for install. Thanks to its supplemental design, the system installs with your current carburetor setup. Installation can be completed in a few hours with common tools. The K&N ECI system is also great for drag racers who race carbureted engines. It is compatible with all fuel types, including E85. It is an ideal solution for marine applications, as the ECU is weatherproof and can be mounted just about anywhere. Say goodbye to headaches associated with carbs and don't worry about switching to EFI.

node.display_name: Baja Designs LP4 Pro LED Lights
node.sales_desc:
The LP4 is the smallest variant in the LP line up but maintains all of the power and features of its siblings. The LP4 features a total of 8,750 lumens and a 200 spread of useable LED light. This light pumps out 7,050 forward projecting lumens and 1,700 lumens of dedicated peripheral lighting courtesy of our patented Integrated Peripheral Technology (IPT).

To keep your light performing at its highest potential, the LP4 integrates our proprietary Direct Ducted Cooling (DDC) technology. This feature allows air to travel through the front of the housing, over the rear heat sinks - drastically improving cooling capacity and performance.

With an amber day-time running light, the LP4 will fulfill all your lighting needs.

node.sales_desc:
Get protection from the sun while still enjoying the breeze with Rough Country's Mesh Bikini Tops! These high-quality mesh tops block 70% of the sun's harmful UV rays, giving you much needed shade and protection while still providing the classic Jeep top-down experience that so many owners enjoy!

These easy-to-install Mesh Tops require no tools to install, and can attach quickly and easily to your jeep's roll bars. Featuring a durable commercial-grade mesh fabric and heavy-duty webbing, these mesh Bimini tops are built to last for a long lifespan of good looks and protection.

Rough Country's Mesh Tops can be left on the Jeep year-round, and fit perfectly under your hard top for an added layer of protection, or so you're always ready to go for a top-down drive!

node.long_desc: Available in black demin or spice;Durable Premium fabric maintains shape in any temperature;Built to factory original quality specifications to ensure a proper fit;23 ounce UV and Mildew resistant Vinyl Coated Polyester Cotton material;Sealed seams for water-tight protection;Heat-tape sealed seams plus DOT-approved vinyl windows (31% tint) meet U.S. and European regulations;3-year limited warranty
node.sales_desc:
Whether you're restoring, updating, or trying to give your Jeep the look you've always wanted, Rough Country's new Soft Tops give you the absolute best bang for your buck. Featuring a 23 Ounce UV and Mildew resistant Vinyl Coated Polyester Cotton material, our tops are engineered to hold up to the harshest elements.

For further durability, Rough Country's Soft Tops feature marine grade 135 gauge bonded polyester thread, double stitched with heat-tape sealed seams designed to take whatever you or Mother Earth can dish out.

Their soft tops feature rear and quarter windows boasting a factory-like 31% tint, and incredibly strong 30mil thick, leak-proof windows. These DOT approved zip-on windows are easily removable to put the wind in your hair!

Rough Country's lightning fast install process helps you get your Soft Top up and running in just minutes. Get a tight, wrinkle-free fit with our state-of-the-art Belt Rail and Hook & Loop attachments, designed to help you get a smooth, stable, snap-on fit with no additional modification necessary! Best of all, Rough Country Tops come with a 3 year warranty!

node.display_name: Curt Manufacturing OEM-Style Gooseneck Hitch Balls
node.long_desc: Gooseneck ball installs easily with quarter-turn latch system;Forged and machined steel gooseneck ball with chrome-plated finish;Retention balls keep the shank fully locked into the hitch;Tested for safety to meet U.S. VESC V-19 specifications;Capacity limited to lowest-rated towing component;Limited lifetime warranty (one-year finish, one-year parts)
node.sales_desc:
Equipping your truck for heavy-duty gooseneck towing and maintaining full functionality for other cargo options is easy with the CURT OEM-style gooseneck ball. This patented trailer ball features an easy, as-needed, drop-in installation and a thoroughly tested design to tackle tough jobs. It also has a versatile design that allows for compatibility with all CURT OEM-style gooseneck hitches.

The CURT OEM-style gooseneck hitch ball is engineered for streamlined installation to accommodate truly hardworking pickup trucks. Its patented installation mechanism allows it to drop into the gooseneck hitch whenever needed and to be removed and stored with ease for full truck bed functionality. It features a top lever and two retention balls built into the shank. To secure the ball, simply drop it into the hole and twist the lever, locking it down for safe, secure towing. To free up the truck bed for other types of towing or hauling cargo, lift the lever and twist a quarter-turn to unlock the retention balls. The gooseneck hitch ball can then easily be removed and stored to be readily available for use on the next job.

For dependable strength and confidence in heavy-duty towing, CURT OEM-style gooseneck balls are constructed from forged and machined steel alloy. This gives them solid strength for managing the largest of gooseneck trailers. The entire ball and shank are shielded in a polished chrome plating, ensuring excellent protection against water, rust, dirt and other threats.

node.display_name: Curt Manufacturing RV Harness Diode Kits
node.long_desc: Allows RV to power lights only on the towed vehicle without power feeding back
node.sales_desc: These kits allows a motorhome or RV dinghy-towing a vehicle to power the signal lights only on the towed vehicle without power feeding back to the RV or feeding to the rest of the towed vehicle's electrical system.
Each kit comes with a pair of All-Pro tubular chromoly upper control arms, extended brakes lines, and a u-bolt flip kit.

node.long_desc: Increases ground clearance and prevents damage to u-bolt threads;Hardened nuts and washers;U-bolt plates tapped for 3/8 bolt (for bump stop installation)"
node.sales_desc: All-Pro Off-Road's Rear U-Bolt Flip Kit turns the u-bolts upside down so the bolt ends face up and away from rocks. This modification has the dual benefit of preventing damage to u-bolt threads and increasing ground clearance.

node.long_desc: High clearance design with improved departure angles;Optional side protection available;Optional high clearance hidden receiver hitch;Completely bolt-on installation;Two integrated recovery points;Outer shell made from 10-gauge CNC laser cut and brake-formed steel plate;Mounting brackets made from industry-leading 3/8-inch thick steel plate with a sturdy 1/4 thick reinforcement backing plate"
node.sales_desc: Get the clearance and strength you need while adding style! All-Pro Off-Road's 05-15 Tacoma Steel High Clearance Rear Bumper is not just for looks. It will give you added peace of mind the next time you're on the trail. The flimsy factory bumper hangs down and gets bent up easily. This often ends up breaking your taillights and causing body damage. The All-Pro rear bumper's high clearance design improves departure angle. For recovery or lifting points, two integrated shackle mounts tie directly to vehicle frame brackets.

node.long_desc: CNC laser cut 3/16 steel;More clearance and protection than stock;All hardware included"
node.sales_desc: Made from 3/16 steel plate, these skids are much larger and stronger than flimsy stock skid plates."

node.display_name: All-Pro Off-Road Baja Series Front Bumpers
node.long_desc: Racing inspired Pre-Runner styling;High clearance design with improved approach angles;Optional Baja Taco" Headlight Hoops & Filler Plates;Completely bolt-on (except on 98-00 models see instructions);Integrated skid plate;Integrated winch and fairlead mounts;(2) Heavy duty recovery recovery points;(2) Light mounting tabs;Lower radiator protection;Hardware included;Made in the USA"
node.sales_desc:
As you know, the Toyota Tacoma is a superb off-road vehicle, but the stock bumper and trim are lightweight pieces that provide little or no protection to the front end of your Tacoma when you're off-road.

All-Pro Off Road has designed a Front Winch Bumper for 95-04 Tacomas to protect the front end of your Toyota, improve off-road capability, and allow for the mounting of up to a 9500-lb. capacity recovery winch with remote solenoid (use of an integrated solenoid winch will require grille trimming). The winch mounting surface has the common 10 x 4.5 bolt pattern used by Warn and other winch manufacturers. Tabs are included for mounting a winch fairlead.

This bumper is mostly built from heavy-duty .120 wall, 1.75 and 1.5 diameter tubing with CNC laser cut and brake formed 3/16 plate steel for the winch structure and mounting plates. The sides wrap around the fenders and there's a bottom hoop that serves as protection for the low hanging radiator with an integrated steel skid plate. All-Pro offers additional skid plates that attach to the bumper and protect the IFS and transmission (the factory skid plate is not compatible). Approach angles are greatly improved because the bumper tucks up and out of the way, providing much more clearance than the factory bumper.

This bumper ships unpainted so that you can finish it to your liking. It simply bolts on using the factory hardware (see instructions for 98-00 models below). We have included 2 light mounting tabs so that you can easily mount up to 6 lights. Please note turn signal mounts are not included, but you can either re-use your stock turn signals with some simple modifications or use universal style lights available at most parts stores. Another option is to modify the factory corner lights to accept a filament bulb (1157 style) so they will function as a marker AND a turn signal light, eliminating the factory turn signal completely.

The Baja Taco options may be ad"

All-Pro APEX series bumpers were designed to meet customer demands for durable, low profile bumpers that look as good as they function. The APEX Tacoma Front Bumper is ideal for trucks running 35 or larger tires and those requiring winch and light mounts. These bumpers are made from CNC laser cut, brake-formed 3/16" steel plate and are MIG welded to strict standards. We install two 1" thick recovery points made from 1.5" x .250"" wall DOM tubing and 3/8" steel plate which are tied directly to the frame.

Multiple lighting configurations are possible thanks to two 4" light mounts on the front, two light mounts on top, and optional light bar hoops. 2" amber turn signals are included. The optional LED Hoop gives space to mount a small light bar while the optional Center Hoop is tall enough to offer grille protection as well as providing two additional light mount tabs. Both hoops are made from 1.75" x .120 wall DOM tubing. All-Pro IFS Skid Plates attach directly to this bumper."

node.long_desc: Signature Kick-Out" design;Upward angled for maximum clearance;Fully gusseted for added strength;Easy installation;Stout 1.75" x .120 wall DOM tubing;.120" steel fill plate"
node.sales_desc:
Our Rock Sliders have been trail tested on some of the most grueling trails around, from the Rubicon to the Hammers. They are built from heavy-duty .120 wall tubing. The shape of our Rock Sliders is very critical and determines how much body protection it will provide as well as how the truck slides along the obstacles without getting hung up. The outer tubes of the Tundra Rock Sliders are 1.75" in diameter, and angle upward to provide maximum ground clearance and door protection. All-Pro Rock Sliders not only look great but can be used as a lift point, easily holding the full weight of the vehicle.

Made from hefty 1.75" x .120" wall DOM steel tubing for the outer structure with 2" square legs that are fully gusseted. They also feature a full-length mounting L-bracket that captures existing holes in the side of your frame with minimal drilling only on the underside using the included countersunk bolts for a smooth surface with no bolts exposed. Also included is a one-piece CNC laser cut .125" steel fill plate with dimple die holes and the APEX logo on the kick-out portion."

node.long_desc: Signature Kick-Out" design;1.75" x .120 wall tubing;Gusseted for added strength;Upward angled design for maximum clearance;Sold as a pair"
node.sales_desc:
All-Pro Rock Sliders feature an upward angle, providing increased ground clearance and improved door protection. The rear of the Rock Slider extends out to provide extra body protection where it's needed most. All-Pro's signature kick-out design protects the vulnerable rocker panels that are prone to contact when in the rocks. As contact occurs near the end of the sliders, our kick-out" design will push your truck out and away from potential hazards to your rig.

All-ProRock Sliders also make a great lifting point. A HighLift Jack can be used anywhere along the bars to lift one or both wheels."

node.display_name: Pro Armor Knee Pads with Storage
node.sales_desc: Pro Armor Knee Pad Storage bags are designed to work with Polaris Stock Rear Doors Pro Armor Lower Door Inserts or Pro Armor Stealth Door. With internal padding to provide added comfort these bags give you additional storage on your ride. Multiple color options let you personalize and match the knee pad to your seats or RZR. Convenient elastic loop allows you to hold goggles or other accessories. Installs easily using the existing hardware.

Pro Armor Glass windshield designed to fit all our Pro Armor Asylum, Baja, Cab-Only & Apex cage systems. Keep out wind, rain dust, and even snow with this custom fit front windshields. With this easy to install windshield, you will be protected from the elements.

node.long_desc: Fully gusseted;Made of thick high grade steel;Trail tested;Excellent protection;Bolt on install
node.sales_desc: The DV8 Offroad bedside sliders provide great protection for the bed of your vehicle when coming off of an obstacle. It's no secret that the departure angle of vehicles is not ideal for hardcore offroading and its not if, but when you will hit your bedsides. Even the OEM protection can't stand up to the abuse that this part of the vehicle sustains (ask us how we know). DV8 has over-engineered this product to take a beating.

node.long_desc: Multiple lighting configurations;Powdercoat finish;Solid steel construction;Light weight;Bolt on installation;Standard DV8 warranty
node.sales_desc: The DV8 Offroad Chase Rack is a rack that features multiple mounting options for lights. The rack bolts securely to the bed of the vehicle and completely enhanced the looks of the truck. This rack also features mesh aluminum accents that can be unbolted and color keyed to match your vehicle or theme. This rack features the option to mount a light bar behind the cab where wind noise is much less of a factor than a standard windshield mount light bar.

node.long_desc: Thick, solid-steel construction;Bold design and stamped RC logo;Work with standard-sized d-rings"
node.sales_desc:
Rough Country's Forged Hooks offer superior strength and reliability in a great-looking package. Upgrade your vehicle with these high-quality, ultra-durable forged hooks so you're sure to never get into a situation you can't get out of!

Rough Country's Forged hooks are made a thick, solid-steel construction to aid in any recovery efforts you encounter. The aggressive, bold design and stamped RC logo give your vehicle an eye-catching, aggressive appearance."

node.display_name: Rough Country Winch Remote Wiring Extension
node.long_desc: Extends wire length for winch remotes;Female to male extension;Waterproof D-style connector;Fits through a 24mm hole
node.sales_desc: Perfect for hidden winch plates and hard to access areas! Rough Country's Winch Remote Wiring Extension gives allows you to extend the lead between your winch and remote. This female to male extension afford your crucial extra length for any application that requires it and features a waterproof D-style connector. Fits through a 24mm hole.

node.long_desc: Black finsh;Zinc base coat;Solid one-piece construction;Made out of ultra-durable .084 Wall corrosion resistant tubing;Cab length;3 inch diameter;74 inch long;Drop step design;4 steps ( 2 per side);465 lbs. weight rating;Bar is positioned high and tight for better fit and cleaner look;Added protection from road debris;Works with or without a body lift;No drilling required;Sold as a pair;Limited lifetime warranty
node.sales_desc:
Rough Country's Cab Length Nerf Steps provide unrelenting style and easier access to your truck. These steps extend the span of the cab offering a clean install that lends to the look of your lifted truck.Rough Country's Nissan Frontier Nerf Steps feature a large, 3-inch diameter tubing that compliments the vehicle design considerably better than smaller 2-inch bars while offering greater durability.

These steps can be installed on any vehicle, with or without a body lift. Rough Country's innovative design actually hides any exposed frame you see under the truck, offering extra protection for your rocker panels. Rough Country Nerf Steps are Made out of ultra-durable .084 Wall corrosion resistant tubing with a Zinc Base Coat and Black Finish for a sharp look that's ready to withstand the elements. Rough Country Steps include a Lifetime Replacement Warranty

node.long_desc: Hawse and Roller fairleads specific mounts;Reattaches in seconds for highway use;Easy installation, no bolts, no drilling, no fuss;Mount to Non Rough Country Bumpers and fairleads aswell
node.sales_desc:
Take your vehicle from street legal to trail ready in a split second with Rough Country's License Plate Mount. Front mounted license plates tend to stick out and can be prone to trail damage, especially on high clearance or low profile aftermarket bumpers, but many solutions require you to unbolt them from the vehicle before you take to the trails. This innovative license plate mount holds your front plate perfectly in place.

This lightning-fast add-on stays put perfectly, even at top speeds and wind resistance, so you can hit the road with peace of mind!

node.long_desc: Constructed with clear zinc plated steel;Features an integrated grease service fitting;Intended for use with 8,000lb winches and larger
node.sales_desc: The Winch Snatch Block is constructed with clear zinc plated steel and features an integrated grease service fitting. When used properly, snatch blocks can double your pulling power and aid in angle pulls, reducing amp draw and heat buildup.

node.display_name: Smittybilt SRC GEN3 Tubular Doors and Door Skins
node.long_desc: Front doors allow you to use OE mirrors;Interior/exterior accessible handle;Billet aluminum handle;Increased lateral visibility and airflow in the cab;Enclosed latch housing;Impact resistant edge guard/end caps;Limit straps included;Optional door skins available, sold separately;Optional trail mirrors available, part number 77798 (sold separately);Door skins help prevent against debris and wind entering the vehicle;Sheet metal construction for strength and rigidity;Sold as a pair
node.sales_desc:
These next generation tube doors from Smittybilt are easy to install and available for JLs. Each door's unique design complements the looks of your JL without sacrificing strength and rigidity.

Use these rigid sheet metal removable tube door skins with the New Smittybilt GEN3 Tube Doors to help keep out the elements and keep you riding longer.

node.long_desc: 2,500 lb rating (833 lb will) on all hardware;3,300 lb polyester webbing (Strongest in the industry);12' Length (The longest standard in the industry);Black epoxy hardware;Coated S-hooks
node.sales_desc: The perfect strap to keep handy on your trail rig. Not only can you keep whatever gear, Tool Box, or Ice chest you have lying around held down tightly, but you'll have no issue with having a strap the will fail, or that may be too short. The high quality hardware and 12' length of the Bull Strap Tie Down will last for years and can handle all of the everyday abuse handed to you out on the trails.

node.long_desc: All black hardware;Easy adjusters;Removable pads;Removable sternum strap;Innovative shoulder Mod-Loop system for attachments, hydration tubes, etc
node.sales_desc: Black enameled hardware provides a sleek, color-matched appearance. Our harnesses are also the only harnesses available with Mod-Loops, giving you the option of adding race radios, phone cases, flashlights, hydration tubes, etc. to the front of your harness for easy access. node.display_name: Rough Country Tow Hook to Shackle Conversion Kit
node.long_desc: Mounts only;Each mount is powder coated black;Durable steel construction;The mounting point was engineered to accept any 3/4in d-ring shackle, allowing you to customize the look of your vehicle;Converts factory tow hook to d-ring shackle;Bolts directly to frame;Fits any factory bumper;Only works with aftermarket bumpers that are designed to retain factory tow hooks;Designed to accommodate shackles with 7/8in size threaded pins;Easy, 100% bolt-on installation
node.sales_desc:
Give your vehicle an upgraded recovery option that offers a more aggressive look with Rough Country's Tow Hook to Shackle Conversion Kit!
This easy-to-install upgrade replaces your factory tow hooks with a durable d-ring shackle mount that's easier to access and gives the front of your vehicle an eye-catching look. Rough Country's Shackle Mount bolts directly to the frame providing the same strength and durability as your factory tow hooks to aid in recovery in any situation. Each mount is powder coated black for a long lifespan of good looks and is designed to work with both factory and many aftermarket bumpers. The mounting point was engineered to accept any 3/4in d-ring shackle, allowing you to customize the look of your vehicle.

Featuring a 100% bolt-on installation process, this great-looking upgrade can be installed in a flash! Simply remove the factory tow hooks and install Rough Country's Tow Hook to Shackle Conversion Kit into the factory tow hook mounting points and you're ready to roll! Best of all, each mount is covered by Rough Country's Lifetime Replacement Guarantee!

node.display_name: Rough Country ATV/UTV Synthetic Winch Rope
node.long_desc: Differnt color ropes;Synthetic Winch Rope for UTV / ATVs;Multiple lengths;Rated up to 7,000lbs;Some include clevis hook and protective sleeve
node.sales_desc: Replace your winch line with Rough Country's super-durable Synthetic Winch Rope for UTV / ATVs! These replacement ropes come in different lengths! Synthetic ropes yield a far greater strength to weight ratio than steel ropes, making them more durable and reliable in recovery scenarios. When steel ropes fray they can produce sharp, painful barbs, a symptom that is not possible with synthetic rope lines. Plus, synthetic ropes do not store energy under stress like steel ropes do, making the safer to operate in the event of breakage.

node.long_desc: Synthetic rope;2 inch drum size;4/87 x 3 inch bolt pattern;Water resistant solenoid and receiver box;3.8ft per minute line speed;Synthetic rope yields the maximum in strength to weight ratio;Includes hawse fairlead;Easy bolt-on installation
node.sales_desc:
When you need a helping hand with your side by side or ATV, you can count on Rough Country's UTV Winch to aid in recovery in any murky situation. Loaded with a synthetic rope and clevis hook, this powerful UTV recovery system offers a robust line pull with a gear ratio for plenty of power to get you back on the trail. Rough Country Winches feature a water-resistant solenoid and receiver box that keeps on ticking even when up against the elements.

Rough Country's UTV Winch System features an ultra-durable synthetic rope that's flexible and won't kink or fragment like steel ropes while also being lighter weight and safer to use! Each winch includes a hawse fairlead and on/off rocker switch for easy operation. Upgrade your UTV or ATV with a Rough Country recovery system and be ready for whatever the trail throws your way!

node.long_desc: Different color ropes;Synthetic rope;Replacement rope;Multiple lengths;Rated for up to 16,000lbs of recovery power;Includes clevis hook and protective sleeve
node.sales_desc: Replace your worn out line with Rough Country's super-durable Synthetic Winch Rope! This 3/8 in replacement rope is 85 feet long and rated for up to 16,000lbs of recovery power! Synthetic ropes yield a far greater strength to weight ratio than steel ropes, making them more durable and reliable in recovery scenarios. When steel ropes fray they can produce sharp, painful barbs, a symptom that is not possible with synthetic rope lines. Plus, synthetic ropes do not store energy under stress like steel ropes do, making the safer to operate in the event of breakage.

node.long_desc: Different color rope;7/16 inch diameter rope;Heavy-duty synthetic rope construction;Breaking strength of 34,000 lbs;Light enough to float;Won't scratch paint or damage finish;Makes recovery easier
node.sales_desc:
Before you find yourself in a situation where you need to throw your winch in gear, do yourself a favor and pick up the handiest recovery solution available. Rough Country's Soft Shackle makes it incredibly easy to recover any type of vehicle. With a heavy-duty synthetic rope construction and a breaking strength of 34,000 lbs, this handy little rope is ready to tackle a tremendous recovery situation.

This 7/16' Diameter Rope is light enough to float on water, but strong enough to hoist a heavy vehicle straight out of the mud. The easy loop-through design makes it simple to connect to any vehicle, regardless if they have traditional recovery points or not, while the soft material protects the paint and finish. Plus, the synthetic rope construction will never rust like metal or absorb water like Nylon.

node.long_desc: Black powder coat finish;Laser cut for a precise;Gives you the ability to wrap your cable length and store your hook in a clean way;Protect your bumper from scrapes and scuffs;Allows you to leave line partially unspooled for instant access;Easy bolt on installation
node.sales_desc:
A cleaner way to secure your clevis hook! Give your hawse fairlead a cleaner look with Rough Country's Clevis Hook Mount. This handy little kit gives you the ability to wrap your cable length and store your hook in a clean way that's easy to access when you need it. Protect your bumper from scrapes and scuffs with this easy upgrade!

This type of mount allows you to leave your line slacked for easy access without waiting for the line to spool out. When spooling the line back in, the handy clevis clip prevents the line from pulling all the way into the fairlead.

This simple solution is perfect for hidden winch systems and any hawse fairlead application. Even better? Installation is a snap! Simply line up Rough Country's Hawse Fairlead Clevis Hook Mount directly behind your Hawse Fairlead and instantly upgrade your vehicle with this clean and clever storage solution.

Rough Country's Hawse Fairlead Clevis Hook Mount is laser cut for a precise fit and powder coated black for a long lifetime of good looks.

node.long_desc: Eye nuts create an easy tie-down point for securing gear to your roof rack;Large opening hole is compatible with most tie-down cam buckle straps, ratchet straps, cinch straps, and bungee cords;Plastic washer ensures a quiet ride for no metal on metal vibrations;Universal fit for use on any of our KC M-RACKS Roof Racks;Includes: two carriage bolts, two plastic washers, and two Eye Nuts
node.sales_desc: KC's Eye Nuts for our KC M-RACKS Roof Racks are a great way to more easily mount and attach gear to the top of your roof rack. From storage containers, to bikes, to anything else, these easy to install tie - down points for your roof rack can help you strap it down. Included in each kit are two carriage bolts, two plastic washers, and two Eye Nuts.

node.sales_desc: Superchips AMP'D Throttle Sensitivity Booster is easy to install, delivers immediate improvement with pedal response, and will optimize your driving experience. AMP'd offers an incredibly simple solution that generates seat of the pants power" you won't find anywhere else. Decreasing pedal lag expedites your vehicle performance curve to occur sooner and supplies quicker turbocharging spooling. AMPd features an intuitive plug-and-play installation using your vehicles stock connections. What makes AMPd even more fun? Settings are adjustable to boost signals by 50% or 100%. If youre interested in obtaining even more power levels and options, check out the AMPd switch today and take throttle sensitivity to the next level!"

These JK Door / Hood Hinge Covers were designed to match the same style of the 'picatinny' rail system that Drake offers for Hoods, A-pillars and Roof Mounts. They perform as tough as their mil-spec look.

The new Drake Off Road picatinny rail' system features mil-spec, hard-anodized, billet machined, extruded aluminum. Want to mount lights, a GoPro, grab handles, highjack lifts, shovels or a mirror? Drake's modular system fits the 2007-18 Jeep JK stock hood mount, A-Pillar, roof rail and more hinge mounts to come.

node.display_name: BF Goodrich Mud-Terrain T/A KM3 UTV Tires
node.sales_desc:
Built through experience... earned on the trail. The new BF Goodrich KM3 tire delivers industry-leading toughness and traction to take drivers anywhere they want to go.

Made to mud: 5% better mud traction. Power through mud and loose soil with BFG's Terrain-Attack tread design. Its massive tread blocks are designed to deliver incredible grip from any angle of approach, and Mud-Phobic Bars release compacted mud for continued traction.

Built to climb: 8% better rock traction. Take on Earth's toughest terrain with advanced Krawl-TEK compound that enhances grip on rock and slick surfaces. Plus, a Linear Flex Zone allows the tire to flex and envelop objects in aired-down driving situations.

Created to conquer: 27% tougher sidewalls. Go places others only dream of, thanks to race-proven advancements. CoreGard Max Technology uses a thick sidewall shield and specialized compound to help guard against sharp objects, while Traction-Armor Sidewall Sculpture helps prevent sidewall splitting.

The first wheel in ITP's Storm Series Line, the Hurricane offers exceptional strength in a modern, stand out design. Features eight sets of X-shaped wheel spokes and offers ITP's exclusive Rock Armor" inner wheel lip to provide unequaled structural integrity. The Hurricane has a unique automotive-like center design and is available in Matte Black or Bronze finish."

The first wheel in ITP's Storm Series Line, the Hurricane offers exceptional strength in a modern, stand out design. Features eight sets of X-shaped wheel spokes and offers ITP's exclusive Rock Armor" inner wheel lip to provide unequaled structural integrity. The Hurricane has a unique automotive-like center design and is available in Matte Black or Bronze finish."

node.long_desc: Hammer black powder coat finish;Satin black powder coat panel finish;Mounts for 5 rock lights per step;Sold as a pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Addictive Desert Designs' Jeep Wrangler JL Rock Slider side steps are built with function in mind. The bottom of the step is a smooth plate of 3/16 steel providing your Jeep with protection in the most extreme conditions. Bolting directly to the vehicle's body mounts give the Jeep JL Rock Sliders extra strength over the OEM step while also allowing our step to cover more of your underbody. Each step includes accommodations for additional lighting. Five provided rock light mounts per step are universal and can mount any brand of light. Lights are aimed to allow the driver to brighten important parts of the trail that are otherwise hard to see. As always, these Jeep Wrangler Rock Sliders are fully bolt-on and made in America."

node.sales_desc:
BaseClamp is the most advanced clamping system in the industry. BaseClamp premium mounts are designed with the goal of achieving the most flexible and low profile mounting solutions that even the most critical powersports enthusiasts will appreciate.

Through creative design and stringent testing we have developed a system with many unique features. Performance and ergonomics were considered throughout every step of development. All BaseClamps feature the highest grade materials, high performance resin coating and stainless steel hardware BaseClamp is the most advanced accessory mounting system in the industry.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Primm Red / Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Primm is a street legal version of the Primm Beadlock wheel with expanded size and truck fitment options. The Primm wheel is available in 17 inch, 18 inch, and 20 inch sizes for 5-lug trucks, 6-lug trucks, and 8-lug trucks. The Primm retains the concave wheel profile from the Primm Beadlock variant to preserve the aggressive styling.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Primm Silver / Machined Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Primm is a street legal version of the Primm Beadlock wheel with expanded size and truck fitment options. The Primm wheel is available in 17 inch, 18 inch, and 20 inch sizes for 5-lug trucks, 6-lug trucks, and 8-lug trucks. The Primm retains the concave wheel profile from the Primm Beadlock variant to preserve the aggressive styling.

The Black Rhino truck and SUV wheels lineup is built with two types of vehicles in mind: The first set-up was built with a negative offset that works perfectly with your Truck or SUV with that Extreme lift. This provides your Off Road Beast with an aggressive stance that these vehicles demand. The second is your more street friendly vehicle that you want to give that stylish look to set it apart from all other vehicles. The wheels offset is more positive and will still allow you to use it on your vehicle with a mild lift or stock appearance.

node.long_desc: Sizes Available: 20;Bolt Patterns: 5, 6, 8 lug;Finish: Gunmetal / Black;Max Load: 2500-3700 lbs"
node.sales_desc: A potent blend of on-road looks and off-road capability, the ALPHA is aimed to increase both the form and function of your Jeep, truck, or SUV. Staying true to the ICON Alloys approach, the ALPHA has been engineered to maximize caliper clearance and optimize wheel position for un-hindered suspension travel and steering function. Backspace dimensions and wheel offset have been strategically developed to reduce scrub radius, improving all-around handling and ride quality and making a set of these wheels the perfect complement to an ICON Vehicle Dynamics suspension system.

node.long_desc: Front bumper features one-piece construction from heavy duty steel for serious strength;Two stage finish of E-coated and then textured black NRT to inhibit corrosion;Custom fit by application;Winch plate with 1 thick shackle mounts for heavy duty models (up to 16,500 lb. winch);Cutouts for extra LED lighting (lights not included);No drilling, welding, or cutting necessary;Not designed for use with proximity sensors or laser speed control sensors, etc.;Limited lifetime on manufacturing, 1-year on black powder coat finish;Made in the USA"
node.sales_desc: Costly damage can happen to your truck's bumper, even when you're not expecting it. Dee Zee in partnership with Kelderman Manufacturing, a well know name in the off-road industry, have joined to design and build the K-Series Bumpers. A rugged off-road look with subtle styling that will surely be noticed. Whether you're protecting your grille from potential roadway hazards or pushing through construction site trash, a formidable front bumper is an absolute must. Upgrade your front end with the Dee Zee K-Series Bumper, the perfect way to add form and function. Custom fit for the specific year, make and model of your truck, these bumpers boast one-piece construction made from heavy duty steel that pairs strength with style. It is an accessory that will last the life of your investment. Cutouts provided on each side for standardized LED lighting sizes. Plus a center opening for mounting up to a 20 light bar (lights not included)."

node.long_desc: Rear bumper features one-piece construction from heavy duty steel for serious strength;Two stage finish of E-coated and then textured black NRT to inhibit corrosion;Integrated cutout for use as step;Custom fit by application;Pair with Dee Zee front bumper for the complete package;Cutouts for extra LED Lighting (lights not included);No drilling, welding, or cutting necessary;Not Designed for use with proximity sensors or laser speed control sensors, etc.;Limited lifetime on manufacturing, 1-year on black powder coat finish;Made in the USA
node.sales_desc: The back end of your truck is sometimes overlooked when it comes to accessories. Dee Zee in partnership with Kelderman Manufacturing has changed this. The K-Series Rear Bumper is a rugged off-road look with subtle styling that will give a complete look in conjunction with the K-Series Front Bumper. Upgrade your rear bumper with the Dee Zee K-Series Bumper, when you want to look just as good going as you do coming. Integrated steps on either side of the bumper provide easy bed access. Custom fit for the specific year, make and model of your truck, these bumpers boast one-piece construction made from heavy duty steel that pairs strength with style. It is an accessory that will last the life of you're investment. Cutouts provided on each side for standardized LED lighting sizes.

node.display_name: Dee Zee Poly Crossover Tool Boxes
node.long_desc: Rigid poly plastic frame resists Warping - no sagging or denting;Overlapping lid and foam gasket helps make box weather resistant;Double-wall Lid features molded brite-tread pattern;Metal striker plate in lid features full-length Locking rod for tight close;Ships to your doorstep without large package surcharges;Available in two sizes for mid-size and full-size trucks;Made in the USA;Limited-lifetime warranty
node.sales_desc: Made of a resilient poly material, the Dee Zee Poly Crossover Tool Box combines the functionality of a crossover tool box with the benefits of hardened poly plastic. This tough box can handle all the abuse you can throw at it, without sagging or denting. The center cross support ties the rear and the front together for additional support. The box has a double-wall lid for rigidity and features a molded brite-tread pattern and textured plastic. The overlapping flap on the lid deflects water from entering the box, where the next line of defense awaits with a foam gasket. You can trust your tools, camping gear or even your golf clubs will benefit from these features. Don't think you are sacrificing security with a lightweight ridgid frame. Metal striker plates are integrated into the lid to engage a full-length locking rod. This single moving part sucks down the entire rigid lid for secure closure every time. The rotary keyed lock stops the bar from moving when locked. Both the keyhole and sliding rod operate from the driver's side. The narrow design avoids interference with truck bed wheel wells and this box can be shipped via ground transportation without any large package surcharges! Going hunting or camping this weekend and need something overnighted to your doorstep? Boom! Available in two lengths to fit midsize trucks (63) and full-size trucks (70"), this box has a discrete look with its low-profile lid that only sits inches above the bed rail and matches spray in bed liners."

node.long_desc: Made from heavy duty 16 gauge steel;Available in extended and crew cab lengths;Allows water and debris to go through the board;Custom fit application ensures quick and easy installation;Made in America's heartland - USA;Limited-lifetime warranty
node.sales_desc: When you would like to try something new. Look no farther than the Dee Zee Louvered Side Steps. Nothing says unique like this design. Dee Zee used its years of experience to create an unmatched style. Made from heavy duty 16 gauge steel and mounted with powder coated braces help prevent rust and wear, keeping your boards strong. With the louvers in the boards allows mud, snow, water, and whatever else you step in daily to easily pass through. The boards come in two lengths for extended and crew cabs.

Includes stainless steel hardware for easy install."

node.long_desc: Provides a guide for steel winch cable for smooth operation with heavy loads;Industry-standard mounting holes are set 10 inch on-center;Main body built from high-strength steel with durable carbide powder coat;Rollers constructed from galvanized steel to resist rust and last longer;Limited lifetime warranty (three-year finish, one-year parts);Compatible with both ARIES TrailCrusher bumpers and TrailChaser bumpers (winch adapter plate #2072100 or winch fairlead mount #15600FB required for winch installation on TrailChaser bumpers);California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Maximize the functionality of your Jeep Wrangler JK with the ARIES winch roller fairlead. Designed to fit the ARIES TrailCrusher or TrailChaser front bumper, this fairlead easily handles steel winch cable for heavy-duty loads. It is built with a powder-coated steel body and galvanized steel rollers for long-lasting operation in spite of the elements, and it is compatible with a variety of winches, featuring industry-standard holes, spaced 10 inch center-to-center (winch adapter plate #2072100 or winch fairlead mount #15600FB required for winch installation on TrailChaser bumpers).

node.display_name: Aries Offroad AdvantEDGE Bull Bar License Plate Bracket
node.long_desc: Easily bolts onto crossbar, using existing cover plate hardware;Provides a solid mounting location to keep license plate visible;Lightweight aluminum construction with a durable black powder coat finish;Limited lifetime warranty (five-year finish, one-year parts);Includes four license plate mounting bolts;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This license plate relocation bracket allows you to reposition your license plate after installing the ARIES AdvantEDGE bull bar. It bolts directly onto the center crossbar, using the pre-existing hardware of the bull bar cover plate, and keeps your license plate secure and clearly visible. The bracket is constructed from lightweight aluminum and features a durable black powder coat finish for long-lasting protection against the elements.

node.long_desc: Drilling is Required;Lights are not Included;Power-Actuated Retractable Light Mount Sold Separately;Three-Inch Cube Light Bracket Kit Sold Separately;Compatible with Most Roll-Up or Folding Bed Covers;One piece ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The next generation of sport bars is here with the Sport Bar 2.0! It retains the popular classic sport bar look with an added modern twist. Taking it a step further, the Sport Bar 2.0 can be used in conjunction with most bed covers and has an option for a power-actuated light mount so lights can be hidden away when not in use.

node.long_desc: Available with or without shocks;Delivers true street & trail (ST) performance;Dependable performance with zero worries;Positive, responsive handling with reduced NVH;Front (3.5+) and Rear (2.5"+) Track Bar Brackets correct caster angle, steering geometry, center the axles, and reduce body roll;Falcon Progressive Front & Rear Bump Stops protect occupants and the vehicle from hard suspension bottoming;Full range of movement for off-road flex and articulation;Install and drive, simple bolt-on installation no welding required;No alignment required;Models with plastic bumpers require removal of bumper-to-fender wind deflector/splash guards in order to fit 35" or larger tires;Requires aftermarket wheels with 4.75" backspacing or less or Offset Wheel Adapters for stock wheels;Max Tire Size: Sport/Sahara Fenders: 35" (with 3" front & 2.5" rear bump stops), Sport/Sahara Fenders: 37" (with 3.5" front & 4" rear bump stops) and Rubicon Fenders: 37" (with 2.5" front & 3" rear bump stops);TeraFlex Lifetime Warranty"
node.sales_desc:
These all-inclusive TeraFlex Sport ST (Street & Trail) Suspensions Systems deliver true street & trail (ST) performance and capability in a dependable and maintenance-free package.

The 4.5 Sport ST4 Suspension System's higher lift height allows for larger tires and a dominating stance, while maintaining a comfortable and stable ride on both highway and trail. TeraFlex's robust Front Control Arm Sport Brackets provide steering geometry correction as well as positive braking control with reduced nose dive.

All Sport ST Suspension Systems feature coil springs and bump stops optimized for stated lift height as well as tire and component clearance.

The Sport ST3 and Sport ST4 feature our Front Control Arm Sport Brackets that optimize caster and pinion angles to restore front suspension geometry. These systems also include Front (3.5"+) and Rear (2.5") Track Bar Brackets to improve steering response, optimize vehicle roll center, and reduce body roll for unsurpassed handling.

This results in a simple install and drive" bolt-on installation with no cutting, welding, or alignment required. These maintenance-free suspension systems provide superior on-road ride quality and comfort with maximum off-road flex. TeraFlex suspension systems provide reduced noise, vibration, and harshness (NVH).

Sport ST Suspension Systems can be installed on Friday, wheeled on Saturday, and driven to church on Sunday!

We recommend Falcon Performance Shocks. Falcon shock absorbers and TeraFlex coil springs have been engineered to work together to improve both compression and rebound for optimal vehicle stability. Sport ST Suspension Systems are offered without shocks or with a choice of select Falcon shock absorbers."

node.long_desc: Delivers true Rogue Trail (RT) performance;Dependable performance with zero worries;Positive, responsive handling with reduced NVH;Innovative IR Bushings provide unrestricted rotation and flex as well as excellent NVH damping;Maintenance-free IR Bushings improve on- and off-road ride quality and performance;Adjustable Alpine IR Front Track Bar and Front (3.5+) and Rear Track Bar Brackets improve steering response;Centers axles to optimize vehicle roll center, and reduce body roll for unsurpassed handling;Front SpeedBump and rear Progressive Bump Stops provide progressive compression during high-speed suspension movement;Full range of movement for off-road flex and articulation;Install and drive simple bolt-on installation no welding required;TeraFlex Limited Lifetime Warranty against defects;Requires aftermarket wheels with 4.75" backspacing or less or Offset Wheel Adapters for stock wheels;Models with plastic bumpers require removal of bumper-to-fender wind deflector/splash guards in order to fit 35" or larger tires"
node.sales_desc:
TeraFlex Alpine RT (Rogue Trail) Suspension Systems build on their already capable Alpine CT (Cross-Trail) Suspension Systems. These systems include all their top-of-the-line components.

This suspension is one of their most popular and versatile systems. With its Alpine IR Long Control Arms & Brackets, the new Alpine RT short or Long Arm provides a completely new driving experience. This kit includes an Alpine IR Front Track Bar and Front and Rear Track Bar Brackets for maximum adjustability making them the perfect mix of performance and comfort.

TeraFlex adjustable Alpine IR Long Control Arms balance front caster angle and pinion angles as well as optimize rear pinion angles, anti-squat geometry, and tire position on vehicles with 3-6 lifts. On higher lifts, Alpine Long Arm Brackets reposition frame-end control arm mounting points to restore near factory orientation to reduce bushing stress during extreme droop as well as shock load transferred through the Alpine IR Long Control Arms.

The adjustable Alpine IR Front Track Bar and Front (3.5"+) and Rear Track Bar Brackets improve steering response, center the axles to optimize vehicle roll center, and reduce body roll for unsurpassed handling.

In addition to optimizing suspension geometry, adjustable Alpine IR Long Control Arms feature their all-new IR (Independent Rotation) Bushings. These innovative bushings remove bushing bind during full suspension travel whether on the highway or the trail. This results in unrestricted droop as well as a noticeable ride improvement.

This results in improved suspension geometry and relaxed control arm angles for a superior ride quality and performance regardless of terrain. These systems restore front and rear roll axis angles to minimize brake dive and acceleration squat. IR Bushings reduce bind during droop for less overall bushing load during articulation. TeraFlex suspension systems provide reduced noise, vibration, and harshness"

The HELLA Group develops and manufactures lighting and electronic components and systems for the automotive industry. node.long_desc: Mounts air tank up and out of the way on the crossmember between the rear frame rails;Utilizes existing free space and does not clutter up engine bay;Powder coat finish for maximum corrosion resistance;Compatible with AccuAir 3.0 Gallon ENDO-Tank or Viair 2.0 Gallon Air Tank (VIAIR-91022);Kit contains mounting bracket and hardware kit;Air tank not included;Requires minimum 3 rear bump stop spacers;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This bracket is designed to mount an onboard air tank conveniently out of the way utilizing free space under the rear floor of the Jeep JK. No cutting or component removal is required. Compatible with AccuAir's ENDO-Tank with integrated valves and integrated compressor. AccuAir's ENDO-Tank is an all-in-one solution including and protecting the valves and compressor all within the air tank. Only a single wire harness needs to be ran to the tank and air lines need to be ran from the tank to any air lockers or air chucks. If not using AccuAir's ENDO-Tank, the air tank needs to be plumbed to an onboard air compressor and will provide a supply of on-demand high pressure air for lockers, airing up tires, etc, without requiring the air compressor to constantly be running. On board air tanks drastically reduce the time required to air up tires. Requires minimum 3 rear bump stop spacers."
